String.Dest: 情况稍好一点儿，我的女士。我现在在治疗他们的伤口。但死伤者的数量仍在上升。

String.Source: How are the wounded holding up?
String.Dest: 那些伤员为什么被阻拦？

String.Source: Restoration can only go so far. These wounds require time. Yet I know all too well how stubborn a soldier can be.
String.Dest: 恢复也就到此为止了。这些创伤需要时间来抚平。然而我却很清楚一个士兵能有多么的倔强。

String.Source: How are the wounded holding up?
String.Dest: 那些伤员为什么被阻拦？

String.Source: Better, my boy, now that I've tended to their wounds. Still, the number of casualties rises by the day.
String.Dest: 好多了，小伙子，我现在要照顾其他人的伤口了。伤亡人数一直在增加。

String.Source: Restoration can only go so far. These wounds require time. Yet I know all too well how stubborn a soldier can be.
String.Dest: 治疗就到此为止了。伤口的复原需要时间。现在我知道战士有多顽强了。

String.Source: How are the wounded holding up?
String.Dest: 那些伤员为什么被阻拦？

String.Source: Whiterun isn't an open city like Falkreath. There are no underground catacombs like in Riften.
String.Dest: 白漫城不是像佛克瑞斯那样的开放城市。也不像裂谷城那样有地下墓穴和水渠。

String.Source: (Dragon Rising) You seem concerned about this attack.
String.Dest: （龙族崛起）看起来你很在乎这次袭击。

String.Source: (Dragon Rising) You seem concerned about this attack.
String.Dest: （龙族崛起）看起来你很在乎这次袭击。

String.Source: There's only one gate. One way in and out of the city. If a dragon were to attack, it would be like being trapped in a burning building.
String.Dest: There's only one gate. One way in and out of the city. If a dragon were to attack, it would be like being trapped in a burning building.

String.Source: I can close your wounds and heal them, as well as my own.
String.Dest: 我能闭合你的创口然后治愈它们，也能治愈我自己的。

String.Source: What restoration skills do you possess?
String.Dest: 你掌握了什么样的回复技能？

String.Source: I possess knowledge of wards and stoneflesh, as to prevent injuries is far more efficient than to heal them.
String.Dest: 我掌握的知识在于结界术和石肤术方面，因为避免受伤总比治疗伤势要有效得多。

String.Source: What restoration skills do you possess?
String.Dest: 你掌握了什么样的回复技能？

String.Source: That was my first lesson. There are many paths to knowledge, and not all of them clear. As for the story of Talara, my father spoiled that ending.
String.Dest: 这是我的第一堂课。获取知识有很多途径，而且并不是每一条路都清晰可见。至于塔拉让的故事，我父亲毁掉了它的结尾。

String.Source: Lessons in storybooks? Ugh. People are always trying to trick you into learning.
String.Dest: 故事书里的经验教训? 呃，人们总是想骗你去学习。

String.Source: Lessons in storybooks? Ugh. People are always trying to trick you into learning.
String.Dest: 故事书里的经验教训? 呃，人们总是想骗你去学习。

String.Source: Apparently there were no more restoration lessons to be gleaned from that series.
String.Dest: 显然，从这堆书中间已经收集不到更多关于恢复系魔法的知识了。

String.Source: That was my first lesson. There are many paths to knowledge, and not all of them clear. As for the story of Talara, my father spoiled that ending.
String.Dest: 这是我的第一堂课。获取知识有很多途径，而且并不是每一条路都清晰可见。至于塔拉让的故事，我父亲毁掉了它的结尾。

String.Source: I see. It was a storybook with practical tips hidden within.
String.Dest: 我明白了。这是一本藏有应用技巧的故事书。

String.Source: I see. It was a storybook with practical tips hidden within.
String.Dest: 我明白了。这是一本藏有应用技巧的故事书。

String.Source: Apparently there were no more restoration lessons to be gleaned from that series.
String.Dest: 显然，从这堆书中间已经收集不到更多关于恢复系魔法的知识了。

String.Source: Even when I had finished, I still did not understand. It was then that my father pointed to a passage toward the end.
String.Dest: 甚至当我读完了全书，我也还是不明白。就在那时，我父亲指向了最后一段。

String.Source: What happened after you read it?
String.Dest: 你读完它之后发生了什么？

String.Source: He said, "Notice how when Ramke heals the girl, she presses her hands against both sides of the wound?"
String.Dest: 他说"看清楚兰卡医治那女孩的时候，她的手是怎么做的了？"

String.Source: What happened after you read it?
String.Dest: 你读完它之后发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened after you read it?
String.Dest: 你读完它之后发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened after you read it?
String.Dest: 你读完它之后发生了什么？

String.Source: Alright, let's hear it.
String.Dest: 好吧，让我们听听。

String.Source: Looking at these shelves, I think back to when my father gave me my first book on restoration. It was not a spell tome, or a guide, but a story.
String.Dest: 看着这些书架，我想起我爸爸给了我第一本回复方面的书的时候了。这并非一本法术书或是本指南，而是一个故事。

String.Source: Alright, let's hear it.
String.Dest: 好吧，让我们听听。

String.Source: A frivolous tale of mystery, princesses, and court intrigue. Naturally, I was confused. My father smiled and simply told me to read the book.
String.Dest: A frivolous tale of mystery, princesses, and court intrigue. Naturally, I was confused. My father smiled and simply told me to read the book.

String.Source: What did she say?
String.Dest: 她说什么？

String.Source: She froze me with those deep, mournful eyes and said: "The day we married, you asked me if I was ever so happy that I felt like I was dreaming."
String.Dest: 我被她哀怨又深沉的眼神瞪得动弹不得，然后听见她说：“我们婚礼的那天，你问过我有没有高兴得以为自己在做梦的体验。”

String.Source: What did she say?
String.Dest: 她说什么？

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: I rushed to her side, poured the last of my health potion down her lips, but it wasn't enough. We needed a healer. And I had but a sword.
String.Dest: 我冲到她的身边，把最后的治疗药水灌入了她的口中，但那是不够的。我们需要一个治疗者。而我却只有一把剑。

String.Source: She touched my blade and asked for my help. To give her death, so that she could cross the bridge to Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 她轻触了我的剑，请求我结束她的生命，让她能够踏上大鲸骨桥去往那松加德。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: She could see it, she said, the great mead hall standing high on the edge of the horizon.
String.Dest: 她喃喃地说道，她已经看见了，看见了那昂然屹立于地平线之上的大蜜酒厅。

String.Source: She could see it, she said, the great mead hall standing high on the edge of the horizon.
String.Dest: 她喃喃地说道，她已经看见了，看见了那昂然屹立于地平线之上的大蜜酒厅。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: No, I told her, it is but a dream. You belong here, on this plane, in this world. This is what's real.
String.Dest: 不，我告诉她，那只是幻觉。你属于这里，属于这个位面，属于这个世界。这才是真实。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: She did. She was no warrior, but she was a Nord, and she had spirit. And sometimes that's enough.
String.Dest: 她确实那样做了。她不是一个战士，但她是一个诺德人，而且是个有骨气的诺德人。而有的时候，这样足矣。

String.Source: I'm sure she fought valiantly.
String.Dest: 她在战场上确实非常英勇！

String.Source: In fact, when we reached the camp, I feared the worst. But she was still alive.
String.Dest: 实际上，当我到营地的时候我已经做好了最坏的打算。但幸好她还活着。

String.Source: I'm sure she fought valiantly.
String.Dest: 她在战场上确实非常英勇！

String.Source: The tents and equipment turned to ash, the ground black as soot, but there she was, lying against a tree not ten yards away, staring at Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 帐篷和装备都被烧成了灰，地面像是煤烟那么黑，而她就躺在一棵树不到十码的地方，用涣散的双眼凝视着松加德。

String.Source: I'm sure she fought valiantly.
String.Dest: 她在战场上确实非常英勇！

String.Source: Yes, I've always figured you were well read.
String.Dest: 是的，我一直觉得你很有学问。

String.Source: Not during my youth, but after the war ended and I lost my wife, I buried myself in studies, reading every tome I could on restoration.
String.Dest: 我年轻时并不是时时刻刻在学习的，但自从战争夺走了我的妻子之后，我就将自己埋在记载有回复法术的旧纸堆里。

String.Source: Yes, I've always figured you were well read.
String.Dest: 是的，我一直觉得你很有学问。

String.Source: My father was a master of the craft, and naturally I turned to his library for support.
String.Dest: 我的父亲曾是工艺大师，我自然而然地向他寻求帮助。

String.Source: Yes, I've always figured you were well read.
String.Dest: 是的，我一直觉得你很有学问。

String.Source: I could tell you the tale of my first lesson, if you are willing to oblige me.
String.Dest: I could tell you the tale of my first lesson, if you are willing to oblige me.

String.Source: What other schools of magic do you use?
String.Dest: 你还有用那些学派的魔法？

String.Source: Every mage, regardless of the school they specialize in, knows a few destruction spells.
String.Dest: 每一位魔法师，不管他们在学校专门研究哪方面，都懂得一些毁灭魔法的吟咏。

String.Source: At first, I scoffed at the notion, as I was already an accomplished soldier. However, time has deteriorated my battle skills.
String.Dest: 一开始，我嘲笑了这个观点，因为我已经是一名技艺高超的战士了。然而，时间让我的战斗技巧退步了。

String.Source: What other schools of magic do you use?
String.Dest: 你还有用那些学派的魔法？

String.Source: It was far easier to study a few tomes on lightning magic than to pick up a mace, and I had vowed never to touch another sword.
String.Dest: 学会一些闪电法术远比拿起一支钉头槌要简单得多，而且我也曾经发过誓，我这辈子再也不碰剑了。

String.Source: What other schools of magic do you use?
String.Dest: 你还有用那些学派的魔法？

String.Source: And of course, I did eventually learn to use magelight, at my father's behest.
String.Dest: 当然，在我父亲的要求下，我最终去学习使用魔光术了。

String.Source: What other schools of magic do you use?
String.Dest: 你还有用那些学派的魔法？

String.Source: I would, but the Stormcloaks are wary of letting an Imperial, especially a former Legion soldier, tend to their injured.
String.Dest: 我会的，但风暴斗篷不会轻易让一个帝国人，尤其还是正规军团士兵，救助他们的伤员的。

String.Source: Do you heal the wounded for both Imperials and Stormcloaks?
String.Dest: 帝国和风暴斗篷的伤员你都治疗了吗？

String.Source: Do you heal the wounded for both Imperials and Stormcloaks?
String.Dest: 帝国和风暴斗篷的伤员你都治疗了吗？

String.Source: (Sigh) Their actions only weaken their forces, as I am forced to provide my services to one side of the war.
String.Dest: (叹息) 他们的行动只是削弱他们的队伍, 导致我被迫向战争中的一方效忠.

String.Source: I have tried to explain this to their commanders with limited success. It is possible my disdain for Ulfric and his lust for power color my pleas.
String.Dest: 我已经试着向他们那些指挥官解释过了，没什么效果。也许是因为我对乌夫瑞克的轻蔑态度影响了我的话语权。

String.Source: Do you heal the wounded for both Imperials and Stormcloaks?
String.Dest: 帝国和风暴斗篷的伤员你都治疗了吗？

String.Source: The man is a bit of a tyrant, and those who fight under his banner are victims of his false ideals.
String.Dest: The man is a bit of a tyrant, and those who fight under his banner are victims of his false ideals.

String.Source: Do you heal the wounded for both Imperials and Stormcloaks?
String.Dest: 帝国和风暴斗篷的伤员你都治疗了吗？

String.Source: You have a kind heart, one that I myself did not have at the time. I begged my father to give her a swift death.
String.Dest: 你有一颗我当时没有的善良的心。我乞求我的父亲能利落地结束她的生命。

String.Source: If I were in such a situation, I would've done the same.
String.Dest: 如果我也处于这样的情况下，那我的反应会跟你一样的。

String.Source: If I were in such a situation, I would've done the same.
String.Dest: 如果我也处于这样的情况下，那我的反应会跟你一样的。

String.Source: I could see, however, that he was disappointed. He did not punish me, but seven years later, the stars saw fit to do so.
String.Dest: 我可以看到，无论如何，他很失望。但他没有惩罚我。7年以后，星辰会责罚我的罪过。

String.Source: If I were in such a situation, I would've done the same.
String.Dest: 如果我也处于这样的情况下，那我的反应会跟你一样的。

String.Source: In any event, my father healed the Khajiit, and brought her to the nearest village. He told them he witnessed her committing a gruesome murder.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我父亲都给那虎人治了伤，然后把她带到最近的村庄。他跟他们讲，她是一场可怕谋杀的凶手，而他目击了一切。

String.Source: This is hardly the time to celebrate my promotion. It's too soon.
String.Dest: 这绝不是祝庆我晋升的时候。尚言之过早呢。

String.Source: I apologize, my love. I did not mean to make light of their deaths. Yet I do think your accomplishments deserve to be praised.
String.Dest: 我得道歉，亲爱的。我不是故意要提他们死了这件事的。但我认为你的成就应该受到称赞。

String.Source: This is hardly the time to celebrate my promotion. It's too soon.
String.Dest: 这绝不是祝庆我晋升的时候。尚言之过早呢。

String.Source: While you were unable to save Savos and Mirabelle, you may have just saved the world.
String.Dest: 如果你不救萨沃斯和米拉贝尔的话，世界会因此而更美好的。

String.Source: This is hardly the time to celebrate my promotion. It's too soon.
String.Dest: 这绝不是祝庆我晋升的时候。尚言之过早呢。

String.Source: Those deaths are not your fault, but the lives you saved owe you a debt of gratitude. As one of them, I thank you on their behalf.
String.Dest: 那些死亡并不是你造成的，但是你救活的人会感激你并欠你一份情。作为这些人中的一个，我代表他们谢谢你。

String.Source: I agree. I did not mean to make light of their deaths. Yet I do think you are dismissing the gravity of your accomplishments.
String.Dest: 我同意。我并没有对他们的死心怀不敬。相反我认为你该放下这任务的的重担了。

String.Source: This is hardly the time to celebrate my promotion. It's too soon.
String.Dest: 这绝不是祝庆我晋升的时候。尚言之过早呢。

String.Source: This is hardly the time to celebrate my promotion. It's too soon.
String.Dest: 这绝不是祝庆我晋升的时候。尚言之过早呢。

String.Source: While you were unable to save Savos and Mirabelle, you may have just saved the world.
String.Dest: 如果你不救萨沃斯和米拉贝尔的话，世界会因此而更美好的。

String.Source: This is hardly the time to celebrate my promotion. It's too soon.
String.Dest: 这绝不是祝庆我晋升的时候。尚言之过早呢。

String.Source: Those deaths are not your fault, but the lives you saved owe you a debt of gratitude. As one of them, I thank you on their behalf.
String.Dest: 那些死亡并不是你造成的，但是你救活的人会感激你并欠你一份情。作为这些人中的一个，我代表他们谢谢你。

String.Source: I wish I could, but the truth is I have not. It is unfortunate, for I do not want to spend the rest of my life married to a ghost.
String.Dest: 我希望我可以，但实际上我不能。很不幸，我不想跟个幽灵结婚，荒废自己的后半生。

String.Source: She would've wanted you to move on with your life.
String.Dest: 她会希望你继续你的生活。

String.Source: It is just hard to envision that one can be lucky enough to find true love twice. I am sorry, but let us not discuss the matter further.
String.Dest: 只是没法想象一个人幸运到能够找到两回真爱。我很抱歉，咱们还是别再谈这个了。

String.Source: She would've wanted you to move on with your life.
String.Dest: 她会希望你继续你的生活。

String.Source: It was right to heal her. She could be tortured and interrogated.
String.Dest: 治疗她是对的，她将被拷问。

String.Source: True enough, but that was not my father's intent.
String.Dest: True enough, but that was not my father's intent.

String.Source: Perhaps he knew that was her fate, so instead of taking her to the city, he brought her to a small village.
String.Dest: 也许他知道这就是她的命运。所以他没有带她去城市。而是带她去了一个小村庄。

String.Source: It was right to heal her. She could be tortured and interrogated.
String.Dest: 治疗她是对的，她将被拷问。

String.Source: It was right to heal her. She could be tortured and interrogated.
String.Dest: 治疗她是对的，她将被拷问。

String.Source: He told the villagers that the Khajiit had committed murder, and that she should be imprisoned for her crime.
String.Dest: 他告诉村民们，那个虎人犯了谋杀罪，她应该被抓起来。

String.Source: I also have the Warrior's temper. So don't get on my bad side.
String.Dest: 别惹我，我也有一个战士的脾气。

String.Source: (Laughs) I wouldn't dream of it, my lady.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我不会做这样的白日梦，女士。

String.Source: (Laughs) I wouldn't dream of it, my boy.
String.Dest: (笑声)真是做梦也想不到啊，我的小伙。

String.Source: I also have the Warrior's temper. So don't get on my bad side.
String.Dest: 别惹我，我也有一个战士的脾气。

String.Source: Ah, my lady is kind, but I was lost then. While the stars lit your path, I stumbled in the darkness.
String.Dest: 啊，善良的女士，我迷路了。当星星照亮你的路的时候，我正在黑暗中蹒跚前行。

String.Source: You weren't so bad yourself, my husband.
String.Dest: 老公，你太责怪你自己了。

String.Source: You weren't so bad yourself, my husband.
String.Dest: 老公，你太责怪你自己了。

String.Source: But then our paths crossed, and your light shone brightly enough for two.
String.Dest: But then our paths crossed, and your light shone brightly enough for two.

String.Source: I love you. These three words I give you. They will not protect you from dragons, or phantoms, or beasts.
String.Dest: 我爱你。这是我所能说给你听的三个字，尽管它们不能从巨龙，幽魂，亦或是兽口之下保护你。

String.Source: You weren't so bad yourself, my husband.
String.Dest: 老公，你太责怪你自己了。

String.Source: You weren't so bad yourself, my husband.
String.Dest: 老公，你太责怪你自己了。

String.Source: But they can travel across worlds, from here to Aetherius, and they will be with you always, even when I am not.
String.Dest: 但他们可以在不同位面之间穿梭，从这儿到艾瑟瑞斯，而且就算我不在你的身边，他们也总能伴随你左右。

String.Source: It was an honor to fight alongside you as well, Valgus.
String.Dest: 能和你并肩作战真是一种荣幸，威尔格斯。

String.Source: Your words do me kindness, Dragonborn, and your actions give the world hope.
String.Dest: 你的话语就是对我的恩惠，龙裔，你的行动给这个世界带来希望。

String.Source: It was an honor to fight alongside you as well, Valgus.
String.Dest: 能和你并肩作战真是一种荣幸，威尔格斯。

String.Source: Your foe is formidable, and your challenge great, but if you hold those you love close, you will never falter.
String.Dest: 你的面前有让人望而生畏的敌人和前所未有的挑战，但只要你的背后有你深爱的人，你就不会迷惘。

String.Source: I see. If every mortal knew that word, can you imagine how pointless wars would be? People would have to solve their differences another way.
String.Dest: 我懂了。如果每个凡人都了解那个词的话，你能想象战争会有多么无意义吗？人们将不得不用另一种方式解决彼此之间的分歧。

String.Source: There is a Dragon word to become ethereal. "Feim."
String.Dest: 一段龙语飘来。“费姆。”

String.Source: But of course, if you take away the Warrior's sword, the Shadow will respond with his dagger.
String.Dest: 但当然了，如果你拿走了勇者的剑，阴影会回馈他一把匕首。

String.Source: There is a Dragon word to become ethereal. "Feim."
String.Dest: 一段龙语飘来。“费姆。”

String.Source: And if we were always ethereal, the world would be a truly boring place. Hmph. It must sound self-serving, but it all comes back to healing.
String.Dest: 以及如果我们都幻化了的话，那这个世界就成了一个超级无聊的地方了。（笑声）这听起来或许有些自私，但就因为现在的状况才有人过来就医。

String.Source: There is a Dragon word to become ethereal. "Feim."
String.Dest: 一段龙语飘来。“费姆。”

String.Source: You could settle it with a brawl. Although Delphine looks like a tough one.
String.Dest: 你可以以打一架的方式来解决。虽说戴尔菲娜看起来很强。

String.Source: No doubt, she won't go down easily. But as much as I'd love to, more violence isn't the answer.
String.Dest: 毫无疑问，她不会轻易被击倒。但是以我来看，暴力并不是解决的方法。

String.Source: That doesn't mean I'm against a friendly wager or a little sparring session. I'd just prefer we didn't bring up politics into it.
String.Dest: 这并不意味着我会反对一次友好的赌博或是一场小小的拳赛。我只是不喜欢将政治掺杂在里面。

String.Source: You could settle it with a brawl. Although Delphine looks like a tough one.
String.Dest: 你可以以打一架的方式来解决。虽说戴尔菲娜看起来很强。

String.Source: Then come with me to the bed, my love, for not even the dragons can come between us.
String.Dest: Then come with me to the bed, my love, for not even the dragons can come between us.

String.Source: Then take me in your arms, my love, and never let go.
String.Dest: 然後把我锁在你怀中，我的爱人，并再也不放开。

String.Source: Yes, I know. But sometimes the war comes to you. And the guards, for all their strength, are not healers.
String.Dest: Yes, I know. But sometimes the war comes to you. And the guards, for all their strength, are not healers.

String.Source: But alas, maybe I'm just trying to rewrite history. The Jarl knows his city better than anyone.
String.Dest: 哎呀，可能我只是想改写历史。领主是最了解他的城市的人。

String.Source: The decisions that are forthcoming are best left up to him.
String.Dest: 将来有什么事要决定的话还是都留给他吧。

String.Source: (Laughs) So the Nords say. Sovngarde awaits. But the heavens are eternal, and for those of us here, eternally far away.
String.Dest: (笑声)所以那些诺德人说，松加德在等待他们。但对于在这里的我们而言，天堂是永存的，却永远遥不可及。

String.Source: Everyone dies. The tragedy is living like a coward.
String.Dest: 所有人都死了。而更大的悲剧就是活得像个懦夫。

String.Source: All I wanted was a few years, no one more day with my Lenora in this life. I suppose I'll have to settle for eternity in the next.
String.Dest: All I wanted was a few years, no one more day with my Lenora in this life. I suppose I'll have to settle for eternity in the next.

String.Source: Everyone dies. The tragedy is living like a coward.
String.Dest: 所有人都死了。而更大的悲剧就是活得像个懦夫。

String.Source: Yes. As you know, I gave up war and politics long ago. Now, all I wish to do is heal the wounded. But I can only do so much.
String.Dest: 对。和你想的一样，我在很久以前就放弃了战争和政治。现在我想要的只是治愈伤痕。但我只能做到这样了。

String.Source: Is your business with Larsdon concluded?
String.Dest: 你和劳斯登的生意终止了吗？

String.Source: (Laughs) True enough, my lady. Yet his people fight on, and the effects of his tyranny remain.
String.Dest: (Laughs) True enough, my lady. Yet his people fight on, and the effects of his tyranny remain.

String.Source: Ulfric was a tyrant. Now he's just dead.
String.Dest: 现在僭主乌弗瑞克嗝屁了。

String.Source: (Laughs) True enough, my boy. Yet his people fight on, and the effects of his tyranny remain.
String.Dest: (笑声) 真够了， 小子。尽管他的暴政还在，他的人还在顽抗。

String.Source: Ulfric was a tyrant. Now he's just dead.
String.Dest: 现在僭主乌弗瑞克嗝屁了。

String.Source: She touched my blade and asked for my help. To give her death, so that she could cross the bridge to Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 她轻触了我的剑，请求我结束她的生命，让她能够踏上大鲸骨桥去往那松加德。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: She could see it, she said, the great mead hall standing high on the edge of the horizon.
String.Dest: 她喃喃地说道，她已经看见了，看见了那昂然屹立于地平线之上的大蜜酒厅。

String.Source: She could see it, she said, the great mead hall standing high on the edge of the horizon.
String.Dest: 她喃喃地说道，她已经看见了，看见了那昂然屹立于地平线之上的大蜜酒厅。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: No, I told her, it is but a dream. You belong here, on this plane, in this world. This is what's real.
String.Dest: 不，我告诉她，那只是幻觉。你属于这里，属于这个位面，属于这个世界。这才是真实。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Yet there was. If I was the man I am now, things would have been different. It was not the Thalmor who killed her.
String.Dest: 然而如果当时的我就如现在的我一样，那情况大概会有所不同。 杀了她的人就不会是梭莫了。

String.Source: There's nothing you could have done.
String.Dest: 那时你是无能为力的。

String.Source: When we returned, we found the entire camp reduced to ashes. But my wife was alive, laying against a tree not ten yards away, staring at Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 到我们回来的时候，看见整片营地都变成了废墟。可我妻子还活着，就躺在一棵树不到十码的地方，用涣散的双眼凝视着松加德。

String.Source: There's nothing you could have done.
String.Dest: 那时你是无能为力的。

String.Source: Her wounds, however, would not let her live much longer. We needed a healer. And I had but a sword.
String.Dest: 然而，她受伤了，她的生命正逐渐从伤口中流逝。我们需要一名治疗者，而我却只有一把剑。

String.Source: There's nothing you could have done.
String.Dest: 那时你是无能为力的。

String.Source: I'm sorry. All that death must've been difficult.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，我早该知道死亡从来就不是件简单的事。

String.Source: My father taught me that to kill a man is an easy thing, and during those times, it came easily for most.
String.Dest: 我的父亲告诉我杀人是件很容易的事情，特别是在这个时代，杀人就更简单了。

String.Source: But to heal a man, to save him from certain death, that was nothing short of a miracle. That was something all good men should strive for.
String.Dest: 但是要治好一个人，要将他从死神手中夺回，其难度和奇迹出现不相上下。那是所有善良的人应当争取的东西。

String.Source: I'm sorry. All that death must've been difficult.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，我早该知道死亡从来就不是件简单的事。

String.Source: Sadly, I did not discover the truth of his words until after I was stricken by tragedy.
String.Dest: 遗憾的是，我没有参悟到他真正想说的话，直到我遭受了那场悲剧。

String.Source: I'm sorry. All that death must've been difficult.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，我早该知道死亡从来就不是件简单的事。

String.Source: Such are the stumbles of youth. We do not heed sage advice, but rather, we allow our mistakes to confirm its wisdom.
String.Dest: 这就是青春的错误。什么不听老人言吃亏在眼前啊，我们会通过自己的错误来确认什么的明智的。

String.Source: I'm sorry. All that death must've been difficult.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，我早该知道死亡从来就不是件简单的事。

String.Source: Indeed. Southern Cyrodiil saw much carnage.
String.Dest: 的确，南赛瑞迪尔地区见证了许多的杀戮。

String.Source: My father taught me that to kill a man is an easy thing, and during those times, it came easily for most.
String.Dest: 我的父亲告诉我杀人是件很容易的事情，特别是在这个时代，杀人就更简单了。

String.Source: Indeed. Southern Cyrodiil saw much carnage.
String.Dest: 的确，南赛瑞迪尔地区见证了许多的杀戮。

String.Source: But to heal a man, to save him from certain death, that was nothing short of a miracle. That was something all good men should strive for.
String.Dest: 但是要治好一个人，要将他从死神手中夺回，其难度和奇迹出现不相上下。那是所有善良的人应当争取的东西。

String.Source: Sadly, I did not discover the truth of his words until after I was stricken by tragedy.
String.Dest: 遗憾的是，我没有参悟到他真正想说的话，直到我遭受了那场悲剧。

String.Source: Indeed. Southern Cyrodiil saw much carnage.
String.Dest: 的确，南赛瑞迪尔地区见证了许多的杀戮。

String.Source: Indeed. Southern Cyrodiil saw much carnage.
String.Dest: 的确，南赛瑞迪尔地区见证了许多的杀戮。

String.Source: Such are the stumbles of youth. We do not heed sage advice, but rather, we allow our mistakes to confirm its wisdom.
String.Dest: 这就是青春的错误。什么不听老人言吃亏在眼前啊，我们会通过自己的错误来确认什么的明智的。

String.Source: I was born in Skingrad, my lady, near the southern border of Cyrodiil. Growing up amidst the Great War, all my life I've been surrounded by death.
String.Dest: 我出生在斯金格勒，我的女士，就在赛瑞迪尔附近的南部边界。我在世界大战中成长，死亡充斥着我的一生。

String.Source: You're a traveler, then. From where do you hail, Imperial?
String.Dest: 那么，你是个旅行者。 你来自什么地方，帝国吗？

String.Source: I was born in Skingrad, my boy, near the southern border of Cyrodiil. Growing up amidst the Great War, all my life I've been surrounded by death.
String.Dest: 我出生在斯金格勒，我的女士，就在赛瑞迪尔附近的南部边界。我在世界大战中成长，死亡充斥着我的一生。

String.Source: You're a traveler, then. From where do you hail, Imperial?
String.Dest: 那么，你是个旅行者。 你来自什么地方，帝国吗？

String.Source: You're right. It is long past time I did. This I have been saying for twenty years mind you, but only now do those words have conviction.
String.Dest: 你是对的。告诉你，我秉持此论这些已经二十年了，那可真是一段悠久的时光...不过直到现在这个时候这些话才有定论

String.Source: Your wife would have wanted you to move on.
String.Dest: 你的妻子肯定想要你继续前进。

String.Source: I thank you, my lady. For bringing me here, and being such pleasant company. In all my travels, I have not had a more resourceful companion.
String.Dest: 非常感谢您，我的女士。感谢您把我带到了这里，同时您也是一位令人愉悦的同伴。在我的旅途中，还从未遇到您这么优秀的旅伴。

String.Source: Your wife would have wanted you to move on.
String.Dest: 你的妻子肯定想要你继续前进。

String.Source: Or a more beautiful one.
String.Dest: 或者一个更漂亮的。

String.Source: Your wife would have wanted you to move on.
String.Dest: 你的妻子肯定想要你继续前进。

String.Source: You're right. It is long past time I did. This I have been saying for twenty years mind you, but only now do those words have conviction.
String.Dest: 你是对的。告诉你，我秉持此论这些已经二十年了，那可真是一段悠久的时光...不过直到现在这个时候这些话才有定论

String.Source: Your wife would have wanted you to move on.
String.Dest: 你的妻子肯定想要你继续前进。

String.Source: I thank you, my friend. For bringing me here, and being such pleasant company. In all my travels, I have not had a more resourceful companion.
String.Dest: 非常感谢您，我的朋友。感谢您把我带到了这里，同时您也是一位令人愉悦的同伴。在我的旅途中，还从未遇到您这么优秀的旅伴。

String.Source: Your wife would have wanted you to move on.
String.Dest: 你的妻子肯定想要你继续前进。

String.Source: Or a more faithful one.
String.Dest: Or a more faithful one.

String.Source: Your wife would have wanted you to move on.
String.Dest: 你的妻子肯定想要你继续前进。

String.Source: (Laughs) You are correct. And it may be another thirty thousand before I get over mine. As such, I do not wish to discuss the matter further.
String.Dest: (笑声)你是对的。或许过了三万年后我才能恢复过来。 正因为如此，我不想再讨论这个问题了。

String.Source: You unfeeling monster. Thirty years is too short to get over a true love.
String.Dest: 你这个冷血的怪物。三十年太短没有办法去忘记一段真爱。

String.Source: Troubled isn't the word I'd use. More like curious.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我的词典里可没有“焦虑”这个词。更多的是“好奇”。

String.Source: (The Way of the Voice) You seem troubled by something.
String.Dest: (龙吼之道) 你似乎被什麽东西给困扰了。

String.Source: Don't you find it ironic that these Greybeards wish to preach non-violence, but their words are as deadly as any blade?
String.Dest: 你不觉的这挺讽刺的吗？灰胡子们都不喜暴力，但他们的话语却都比任何武器都要致命。

String.Source: (The Way of the Voice) You seem troubled by something.
String.Dest: (龙吼之道) 你似乎被什麽东西给困扰了。

String.Source: I wonder how they reconcile their training with their ideals. Why train to be a swordsman when you can be a healer instead?
String.Dest: 我真不知道他们怎么才能把理念与自我培养的问题协调好，如果你能当一个治病救人的人，干嘛还要当一名战士呢？

String.Source: (The Way of the Voice) You seem troubled by something.
String.Dest: (龙吼之道) 你似乎被什麽东西给困扰了。

String.Source: (The Way of the Voice) You seem troubled by something.
String.Dest: (龙吼之道) 你似乎被什麽东西给困扰了。

String.Source: I know not the Dragon tongue, but perhaps not every word in their language is a call for blood. That is the kind of knowledge they should seek.
String.Dest: 我不了解龙语，但也许在他们语言里，不是每一个词汇都是为了伤害对手。而是他们寻求着的一种知识。

String.Source: I always believed there were survivors. The stories they told of the purge of Cloud Ruler Temple seemed like Thalmor propaganda.
String.Dest: 我始终相信有幸存者。他们讲述的关于凌云者神殿净化的故事似乎像是梭默的宣传。

String.Source: (A Blade in the Dark) It seems Delphine is a member of the Blades.
String.Dest: （黑暗中的利刃）看起来戴尔菲娜是刀锋的成员。

String.Source: Still, even before the war the Blades were like old ghosts, long replaced by the Oculatus.
String.Dest: 不过，即使是战争之前，刀锋战士就早已被锐眼鹰组织取代，成为不散的阴魂了。

String.Source: (A Blade in the Dark) It seems Delphine is a member of the Blades.
String.Dest: （黑暗中的利刃）看起来戴尔菲娜是刀锋的成员。

String.Source: (A Blade in the Dark) It seems Delphine is a member of the Blades.
String.Dest: （黑暗中的利刃）看起来戴尔菲娜是刀锋的成员。

String.Source: Dragon blood or not, they should have served the Empire. They aren't much different than the Stormcloaks. They mean well, but act poorly.
String.Dest: 不管是不是龙的血脉，他们也该效忠帝国的。他们跟风暴斗篷没什么差别。想得很好，做得很糟。

String.Source: I heard the World Eater was dead, and yet as I waited for you to return, I could not help but think the worst.
String.Dest: 我听说世界吞噬者已经死了，但在我等你回来的时候，总是控制不了自己去想最坏的结果。

String.Source: I've returned, my husband. Alduin will not.
String.Dest: 我回来了亲爱的，可奥杜因回不来了。

String.Source: Forgive me for my foolishness, my dear. Truly the stars would not be so cruel as to take you from me now.
String.Dest: 原谅我的愚蠢，亲爱的。毫无疑问，众星辰不会如此残酷地现在就把你从我身边夺走。

String.Source: I've returned, my husband. Alduin will not.
String.Dest: 我回来了亲爱的，可奥杜因回不来了。

String.Source: You are a true hero. You have the Warrior's courage, the Lover's compassion, and the Lady's kindness.
String.Dest: 你是一个真正的英雄。你有战士的勇气，情人的同情，和女士的善意。

String.Source: I've returned, my husband. Alduin will not.
String.Dest: 我回来了亲爱的，可奥杜因回不来了。

String.Source: I've returned, my husband. Alduin will not.
String.Dest: 我回来了亲爱的，可奥杜因回不来了。

String.Source: But to me you are more than that. You are my wife, and my one true love. Tonight I want you here, by my side. The world can wait.
String.Dest: 但对我来说你比这些更重要。你是我的妻子，我唯一的真爱。今晚我想要你陪在我身边。把其他所有一切搁在一旁。

String.Source: (Laughs) So it would seem. Well done, Dragonborn, well done. You are every bit the hero that the stars foretold.
String.Dest: (笑声)如你所见。做得好，龙裔, 做得好。你就是那被星辰所预言的英雄啊。

String.Source: Alduin is dead, and the world is safe. The next one will have to wait its turn.
String.Dest: 奥杜因死了，世界安全了。下一个会等着出场。

String.Source: And I am glad to see you are not wounded, either. Truly, you have the Lord's resilience, the Thief's cunning, and the Warrior's courage.
String.Dest: 我很高兴看见你也毫发无损。说真的，你有领主的能力，盗贼的狡猾和战士的勇气。

String.Source: Alduin is dead, and the world is safe. The next one will have to wait its turn.
String.Dest: 奥杜因死了，世界安全了。下一个会等着出场。

String.Source: My wife and I never had children, but when I look at you, I feel like a father, beaming at the accomplishments of his firstborn.
String.Dest: 我和我妻子从来没有孩子，可当我看着你，就觉得像做爸爸一样，有一种微笑着看着自己第一个孩子的成就感。

String.Source: Alduin is dead, and the world is safe. The next one will have to wait its turn.
String.Dest: 奥杜因死了，世界安全了。下一个会等着出场。

String.Source: I'm proud of you. Not just for what you've done, but who you've become. I am thankful to have traveled beside you.
String.Dest: 我为你感到骄傲。不只是为你做了什么，更是为你已经成为了什么。我很感谢能与你同行。

String.Source: Alduin is dead, and the world is safe. The next one will have to wait its turn.
String.Dest: 奥杜因死了，世界安全了。下一个会等着出场。

String.Source: But I'm sure by now you're tired of such praise. What's next for you, Dragonborn? What will you do now that you are free of your destiny?
String.Dest: 但我相信你已经厌倦了这样的赞美。有什么打算吗，龙裔？如今你终于摆脱了宿命，你想去做些什么呢？

String.Source: Alduin is dead, and the world is safe. The next one will have to wait its turn.
String.Dest: 奥杜因死了，世界安全了。下一个会等着出场。

String.Source: (Laughs) It is well deserved, Dragonborn. Let the Shadow bless you with the night, so that you may slumber undisturbed.
String.Dest: (笑声)那是理所当然的，龙裔。愿阴影在夜晚保佑你，让你在睡觉的时候不被别人打扰。

String.Source: I plan on taking a nice long nap.
String.Dest: 我打算美美地睡一觉。

String.Source: Yet if you choose to resume your adventures, I would welcome traveling with you once more. A healer's work is never done.
String.Dest: Yet if you choose to resume your adventures, I would welcome traveling with you once more. A healer's work is never done.

String.Source: I plan on taking a nice long nap.
String.Dest: 我打算美美地睡一觉。

String.Source: For you may have saved us from Alduin, but not even a Dragonborn can save us from ourselves.
String.Dest: 你或许可以从奥杜因手中拯救我们，但即使是龙裔也不能使我们得到救赎。

String.Source: I plan on taking a nice long nap.
String.Dest: 我打算美美地睡一觉。

String.Source: We decided to scout for one more night before returning back. It was then that our eyes were drawn not south, but north, by geysers of fire.
String.Dest: We decided to scout for one more night before returning back. It was then that our eyes were drawn not south, but north, by geysers of fire.

String.Source: So did you stay or report back to camp?
String.Dest: So did you stay or report back to camp?

String.Source: Naarifin's army had come not from Valenwood, but from hidden camps strewn about Elsweyr.
String.Dest: 纳里芬的部队不是来自威木省, 而是从艾斯威尔附近隐藏的营地来的。

String.Source: So did you stay or report back to camp?
String.Dest: So did you stay or report back to camp?

String.Source: So did you stay or report back to camp?
String.Dest: So did you stay or report back to camp?

String.Source: The forces gathering in Arenthia were a secondary army, there to flank the Legion troops that sought to regroup from the invasion.
String.Dest: 在亚伦西亚聚集的是一队预备队，正准备插入待重组的军团旅侧翼.

String.Source: But in that moment, I cared not for military tactics or the fate of the Empire. All my thoughts turned to my wife.
String.Dest: 但是那个时候，我不在乎什么军事策略或者什么帝国的命运。我满脑子就只有我的妻子。

String.Source: So did you stay or report back to camp?
String.Dest: So did you stay or report back to camp?

String.Source: We were stationed together near the crossing where Cyrodiil meets Valenwood and Elsweyr. She was the quartermaster's apprentice. I was a scout.
String.Dest: 我们一起驻扎在赛瑞迪尔、威木省和艾斯维尔相交的岔路口附近。她是军需官的助手，我是个侦察兵。

String.Source: You never told me the story about your wife.
String.Dest: 你从未告诉过我关于你妻子的故事。

String.Source: We had heard rumors that Lord Naarifin had raised an army in Arenthia with the intent to invade. Our commander sent scouts to investigate.
String.Dest: 我们听到了流言，说纳里芬将军在亚伦西亚组建了一支军队，有意图发动侵略。我们的指挥官派了斥候前去打探。

String.Source: You never told me the story about your wife.
String.Dest: 你从未告诉过我关于你妻子的故事。

String.Source: I was a member of that group. We set out west, and combed the border region for three days.
String.Dest: 我曾经是那个小组的一员。我们向西出发，在边界地区搜寻了三天。

String.Source: You never told me the story about your wife.
String.Dest: 你从未告诉过我关于你妻子的故事。

String.Source: There were plenty of small camps and garrisons, but no evidence that Lord Naarifin himself had brought his armies to the border.
String.Dest: 尽管那儿确实有不少小兵营以及驻地什么的，但没有证据显示纳里芬君王亲自率兵驻扎在边境。

String.Source: You never told me the story about your wife.
String.Dest: 你从未告诉过我关于你妻子的故事。

String.Source: Ah, but you forget. To heal and to harm are two sides of the same coin. Restoration can be used to dominate your opponent, just as fire and ice.
String.Dest: 啊，但是你忘记了。治疗和伤害是同一枚硬币的两面。回复也可以支配你的对手，正如火与冰的关系一样。

String.Source: Dragons are inherently violent. Thus the thu'um is mostly about smashing stuff.
String.Dest: 龙生来就是暴力的，因而他们的thu'um(龙语）只会用来搞破坏。

String.Source: Dragons are inherently violent. Thus the thu'um is mostly about smashing stuff.
String.Dest: 龙生来就是暴力的，因而他们的thu'um(龙语）只会用来搞破坏。

String.Source: If the dragons are keen on battle, they must have words to give to their wounded. Maybe not to comfort the injured, but to return them to battle.
String.Dest: 如果龙族都那么喜欢战斗，他们一定会有些针对伤员的龙语。就算不是为了安抚，也是要把它们吼回战场上去。

String.Source: Dragons are inherently violent. Thus the thu'um is mostly about smashing stuff.
String.Dest: 龙生来就是暴力的，因而他们的thu'um(龙语）只会用来搞破坏。

String.Source: I just find it odd the Greybeards choose to isolate their power instead of seeking ways to have it reflect their ideals.
String.Dest: I just find it odd the Greybeards choose to isolate their power instead of seeking ways to have it reflect their ideals.

String.Source: But perhaps I'm just projecting my own desires. I'm just praying there's a thu'um that can fix this insufferable back of mine.
String.Dest: 但也许我有点自私。我只祈祷能有一个吐目可以治愈我那难以忍受的背痛。

String.Source: Dragons are inherently violent. Thus the thu'um is mostly about smashing stuff.
String.Dest: 龙生来就是暴力的，因而他们的thu'um(龙语）只会用来搞破坏。

String.Source: Do I have to keep you two separated?
String.Dest: 我需要让你俩保持距离么？

String.Source: Don't worry, it won't come to that. The war's over, and there's no point in opening old wounds. I'll do my best to be civil.
String.Dest: (笑声) 别担心，没必要变成这样。战争结束了，没有任何理由去揭开旧的伤疤。我会尽最大的努力为公众服务。

String.Source: (Laughs) As you wish, my lady. Let us walk from here to Aetherius, and paint the sky with our light.
String.Dest: (笑声) 如您所愿，女士。让我们出发前往艾瑟瑞斯，用灯光点亮夜空。

String.Source: Okay, but tomorrow we're going back to adventuring.
String.Dest: 好，但明天我们会返回继续探险的。

String.Source: You miss her, don't you.
String.Dest: 你想念她，不是吗？.

String.Source: I did. But it is time to move on. Although I have been saying that for twenty years, so I know not if my words have conviction.
String.Dest: 确实。不过现在是时候放下了。虽然我这话说了有二十年，我也不知道自己有没有这个信念。

String.Source: I thank you, my lady. For bringing me here, and being such pleasant company. I have not felt this way about any companion for some time.
String.Dest: 非常感谢您，我的女士。感谢您把我带到了这里，同时您也是一位令人愉悦的同伴。在我的旅途中，还从未遇到您这么优秀的旅伴。

String.Source: You miss her, don't you.
String.Dest: 你想念她，不是吗？.

String.Source: I did. But it is time to move on. Although I have been saying that for twenty years now, so I know not if my words have conviction.
String.Dest: 我知道。但是是时候动身了。尽管我知道我的话没什么说服力——毕竟到现在这话我已经说了二十年了，但是我还是要说。

String.Source: You miss her, don't you.
String.Dest: 你想念她，不是吗？.

String.Source: I thank you, my boy. For bringing me here, and being such pleasant company.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，我的孩子。谢谢你带我来这里。你是如此地值得信赖。

String.Source: You miss her, don't you.
String.Dest: 你想念她，不是吗？.

String.Source: (Laughs) Then I'm afraid I can't help you.
String.Dest: (笑声)恐怕我帮不了你。

String.Source: Rumarin, I'm sorry. Books offer hints at how to improve at restoration, but it would take a fifty volume epic to teach even the simplest spells.
String.Dest: 罗米勒，对不起。书上是提到些增强回复系的小技巧，但就算用五十卷巨着恐怕也难以教人学会哪怕最简单的法术。

String.Source: A tome is still the best way to learn. My advice is to just keep at it. Don't rush. It'll come eventually.
String.Dest: 找本书看依旧是最好的学习方法。我的建议就是继续保持下去。别图快。你会成功的。

String.Source: A dead adventurer, no doubt investigating Gauldur's legend. I fear the book Lost Legends has cost many their lives. I commit his soul to Aetherius.
String.Dest: 一个死去的冒险者，毫无疑问，他在调查尸鬼的传说。恐怕这本记有失落的传说的书让很多的冒险家付出了生命。愿他的灵魂回归艾瑟瑞斯的怀抱。

String.Source: These stone sentinels stand at the boundary between Falkreath and the Rift. A marvelous display of Nord architecture to be sure.
String.Dest: 这些石头守卫立于佛克瑞斯和裂痕领的交界，是诺德建筑师的杰作。

String.Source: The Nord burial rites for people of renown must have been very different in Geirund's time. The body almost seems as if it's on display.
String.Dest: 诺德人埋葬显赫之人的仪式在吉尔蒙德时代定然是大不相同。遗体看起来几乎是在彰显地位。

String.Source: Candles...conjuration circles. The stars are dim here. Be ready.
String.Dest: 虚空中的元素啊，聆听我的祈祷，回应我的召唤，照亮前方的道路...烛光术！ 这里星星很暗。准备好吧。

String.Source: A shrine to Julianos. What kind of misguided warlock would call these experiments wisdom?
String.Dest: 尤里安诺思的圣殿。被忽悠成什么样的术士才会认为这样的实验明智？

String.Source: Look at that corpse. The heart was removed, as if in preparation for a ritual. But I thought only witches could perform such dark magic.
String.Dest: 看看那具死尸。心被挖走了，好像是为什么仪式做准备。但是我想也只有女巫能玩得转这些黑魔法了。

String.Source: I hate to admit it, but Meridia was right. These corpses...Stormcloak, and Imperial...their souls scream for peace.
String.Dest: 我痛恨承认这一点，美瑞狄亚是对的。这些尸体...风暴斗篷的，帝国的...他们的灵魂都在为和平而嘶吼。

String.Source: Malkoran is likely in the next chamber. Let us bring peace to these soldiers, Stormcloak and Imperial, so they may find their way to Aetherius.
String.Dest: 莫克然应该就在下一个大厅里。让我们给这些暴风斗篷和帝国军团的士兵送去点祥和吧，这样他们或许能找得到去艾瑟瑞斯的路。

String.Source: Draugr...necromancers...whatever that light is focused on, it can't possibly be benevolent. We must end this ritual at all costs.
String.Dest: 尸鬼...亡灵术士...不管对手是谁，他们可都不是什么善茬儿。我们必须终结这个仪式，不惜一切代价。

String.Source: I want to return to my earlier questions.
String.Dest: 我想回到我刚才的问题。

String.Source: Understood.
String.Dest: 了解。

String.Source: I am afraid I do not know. As Karras said, the Kingsmoot is but a formality.
String.Dest: 恐怕我不知道。卡拉斯说众王议会只是个形式。

String.Source: Do you think her claim will be recognized?
String.Dest: 你觉得她提出来的要求会被同意吗？

String.Source: Yet the name Ysgramor is revered by every Nord in Skyrim, and not even someone like Ulfric could deny them consideration.
String.Dest: 然而，伊斯格拉谟之名被每一个天际省的诺德人崇敬着，甚至是如乌佛瑞克之流也不可否认地尊敬于他。

String.Source: Do you think her claim will be recognized?
String.Dest: 你觉得她提出来的要求会被同意吗？

String.Source: Like Elisif, I suspect her readiness depends on her advisers, but my presence is not in support of her cause.
String.Dest: 就像艾利西弗，我怀疑她的充分准备都来自于她的智囊，但我到场可不是为了支持她的事业。

String.Source: Do you believe this Queen is fit to rule?
String.Dest: 你相信这位女王适合来统治？

String.Source: Whether this ritual proves her bloodline is irrelevant. My only concern is that she survives it.
String.Dest: 不论她的血统借由这仪式所证是否就是正统。我所在意的不是那些，我在意的是她能否继续统治。

String.Source: Do you believe this Queen is fit to rule?
String.Dest: 你相信这位女王适合来统治？

String.Source: From what I gather, she's a child, and for that reason she is quite vulnerable.
String.Dest: 从我搜集的资料来看，她只是个孩子，相当地脆弱。

String.Source: Have you met this heir? Any idea who she is?
String.Dest: 你见过这个后裔吗？她在哪儿？

String.Source: It's also why the Thane keeps her location and identity a secret, and why her presence is not required here.
String.Dest: 这也是为什么领主从未披露过她的处所与身份的原因，也是为什么她对于这儿来说没有存在的必要的原因。

String.Source: Have you met this heir? Any idea who she is?
String.Dest: 你见过这个后裔吗？她在哪儿？

String.Source: How did you come to join this faction?
String.Dest: 你怎么就加入了这个阵营呢？

String.Source: During my time wandering the military camps, I heard many grumblings from the disenchanted.
String.Dest: 在我游荡于军营的日子里，听到了很多心灰意懒的牢骚话。

String.Source: They spoke of a faction of peace, united under the banner of the true heir of Ysgramor.
String.Dest: 他们说起一个什么和平的组织，打着伊斯格拉谟真正继承人的旗号。

String.Source: How did you come to join this faction?
String.Dest: 你怎么就加入了这个阵营呢？

String.Source: Still, I never sought out the Thane. However, as the Temple of Kynareth is in Whiterun, it was only a matter of time before our paths crossed.
String.Dest: 我还是没找到男爵。然而，既然白漫城有凯娜瑞斯神庙，那在我们度过这一切前，只是时间问题了。

String.Source: How did you come to join this faction?
String.Dest: 你怎么就加入了这个阵营呢？

String.Source: How did you come to join this faction?
String.Dest: 你怎么就加入了这个阵营呢？

String.Source: For you see, the ritual to prove the Queen's legitimacy requires a healer. Thus, the stars guided him to the temple, and to me.
String.Dest: 如你所见，这个证明女王合法性的仪式需要一个治疗师。因此，星辰指引他来到这个寺庙，来到我的面前。

String.Source: Who are you?
String.Dest: 你是谁？

String.Source: My apologies for prattling on, stranger, as I have not yet introduced myself. My name is Valgus, a healer who follows the stars.
String.Dest: 抱歉我只是开个玩笑，陌生人，我还没介绍自己呢。我叫威尔格斯，一名追随星辰指引的救济生灵之人。

String.Source: My love, the stars seem to be fixed in the sky, but they are always moving, as are we.
String.Dest: 吾爱，天上的星星看上去是静止的，但它们一直在移动，我们也一样。

String.Source: Valgus, my love. You never told me about any of this.
String.Dest: 亲爱的威尔格斯，你可从来没跟我提起过这回事儿

String.Source: But those whose hearts are connected will always move as one.
String.Dest: 但是那些心灵相通的人可以永远配合无间，就像一个人似的。

String.Source: Valgus, my love. You never told me about any of this.
String.Dest: 亲爱的威尔格斯，你可从来没跟我提起过这回事儿

String.Source: Valgus. Didn't expect to see you here.
String.Dest: 威尔格斯！没想到在这儿能见到你！

String.Source: The stars seem to be fixed in the sky, but they are always moving, as are we.
String.Dest: 天上的星星看上去是静止的，但它们一直在移动动，我们也一样。

String.Source: But those whose fates are connected will always move as one.
String.Dest: 但是那些命运紧紧相连的人永远不会分开。

String.Source: Valgus. Didn't expect to see you here.
String.Dest: 威尔格斯！没想到在这儿能见到你！

String.Source: Ah, Dragonborn. It seems the Steed has brought us both here, as instruments in a greater plan.
String.Dest: 啊，龙裔。看来骏马之石似乎把我们两个都带到了这里，为某个伟大的计划而服务。

String.Source: May the Lord, through victory or defeat, plant the seeds of peace.
String.Dest: 愿诸神，能够撒下和平的种子，无论这场战争是哪方获胜。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Larsdon and Falatild?
String.Dest: 对于劳斯登和菲欧露你怎么看？

String.Source: The Thane was born under the sign of the Lover, no doubt. Graceful, but passionate about his cause.
String.Dest: 领主因时运和神迹而生。毫无疑问，领主得优雅，并且热爱他的事业。

String.Source: The housecarl I know little about, other than she refuses to let me heal her.
String.Dest: 除了她拒绝我的治疗之外，我对这个侍卫了解甚少。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Larsdon and Falatild?
String.Dest: 对于劳斯登和菲欧露你怎么看？

String.Source: A dead adventurer, no doubt investigating Gauldur's legend. I fear the book Lost Legends has cost many their lives. I commit his soul to Aetherius.
String.Dest: 一个死去的冒险者，毫无疑问，他在调查尸鬼的传说。恐怕这本记有失落的传说的书让很多的冒险家付出了生命。愿他的灵魂回归艾瑟瑞斯的怀抱。

String.Source: {Departs}
String.Dest: {离开 }

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Very well my dear, call upon me at our home if you need my services again.
String.Dest: Very well my dear, call upon me at our home if you need my services again.

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Very well. I will return to wandering the camps, but if you need my staff once more, I will be at the Temple of Kynareth on the days of rest.
String.Dest: 好的，我会走回营地。 如果你再需要我的货, 我会在休息日守在凯娜瑞斯神殿那里。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: I will do what I can.
String.Dest: 我会尽我所能。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下。

String.Source: Understood. I'll stand guard until you get back.
String.Dest: 明白。我将一直坚守到你回来。

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Carry on then.
String.Dest: 那就继续吧。

String.Source: Understood.
String.Dest: 了解。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: Take your time.
String.Dest: 抓紧时间。

String.Source: Take your time.
String.Dest: 慢慢儿来。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Sure. What do you need?
String.Dest: 当然，你需要什么？

String.Source: Very well, let us trade.
String.Dest: 很好，咱们来交换吧。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Our burdens are best spread between us.
String.Dest: 我们最好共同分担责任。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Of course. Let's trade.
String.Dest: 当然。咱们来做生意吧。

String.Source: All right. How can I help?
String.Dest: 好吧。我怎么帮忙？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: What do you need me to take?
String.Dest: 你有什么要我拿的？

String.Source: Of course, my love.
String.Dest: 当然了，亲爱的。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: As you wish.
String.Dest: 遵命。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: I am at your assistance.
String.Dest: I am at your assistance.

String.Source: As you wish.
String.Dest: 遵命。

String.Source: I will do what I can.
String.Dest: 我会尽我所能。

String.Source: Zzzzz...
String.Dest: Zzzzz……

String.Source: If the trials in Ustengrav could only be passed by a wielder of the voice, how is it someone managed to beat you to the horn?
String.Dest: 要是炙燃墓的机关只能由懂得龙吼的人破解，那怎么可能有人比你先抢到那个号角呢？

String.Source: Amazing how easy the path to the Horn has been. Draugr, conjurers, bandits...it's almost like wading through a battlefield, looking for survivors.
String.Dest: 这条号角之路可真是简单得令人吃惊啊。尸鬼，术士，强盗...搞得好像在穿越战场寻找幸存者似的。

String.Source: We're here. The Greybeards are waiting, but I doubt they are waiting impatiently. I could use a rest at the inn. I'm not as young as I used to be.
String.Dest: 我们到了。灰胡子们正在等我们，但我怀疑他们没多少耐心。我想在旅馆里休息休息。我已经不如年轻时那样啦。

String.Source: It takes resolve to avoid human contact. I have too much of the Lord and the Lady my blood, and I would be the first to greet Klimmek at the door.
String.Dest: 不再与人类接触是需要决心的. 我的血还没那么高贵，但我将是第一个站在门口迎接科林麦的人。

String.Source: That shout was impressive. Yet I've heard the Greybeards espouse a philosophy of non-violence. I wonder if the thu'um has the power to restore.
String.Dest: 这吼声真是叫人印象深刻。但我听说灰胡子主张非暴力的信条。我不知道吐目是否有恢复的能力。

String.Source: That brawler. I know him. Gian the Fist, they used to call him. It doesn't surprise me that he ended up here.
String.Dest: 那个吵架的。我认识他。重拳盖安，他们以前这样称呼他。他最后流落到这儿毫不稀奇。

String.Source: The Thieves Guild need you to be their muscle. It's not surprising. Judging by the state of their headquarters, their arms as thin as blisterworts.
String.Dest: 盗贼公会需要你为他们助力。这并不奇怪，考虑到他们那组织的状况，他们那力量可是比气泡草还弱。

String.Source: If nothing else, your foray into the Thieves Guild has provided us valuable information on Maven Black-Briar. The Jarl should know of her dealings.
String.Dest: 如果没别的了，那么你对盗贼工会的渗透已经给我们提供了关于玛雯黑荆棘的宝贵信息。领主应该知道她肮脏的作为。

String.Source: Brynjolf goes to great lengths to insist you don't kill these targets, as if that absolves him of his crimes. It doesn't.
String.Dest: 布林乔夫用了相当长的篇幅来跟你强调不要杀掉这些任务目标，就好象这样做能免除他自己的罪行似的。那根本不可能。

String.Source: This Hamelyn descended into madness, but the signs were there long before. Yet his instructors chose to banish a man they could have rehabilitated.
String.Dest: 哈姆林陷入了疯狂，但在此之前已有迹象。然而他的导师却选择放逐了这个可能会恢复正常的男人。

String.Source: I wonder if Sabjorn is truly as underhanded as Maven implies. It does make me laugh at the irony.
String.Dest: I wonder if Sabjorn is truly as underhanded as Maven implies. It does make me laugh at the irony.

String.Source: It is good to see you alive and well. Ironic that it was a poison that served as the remedy for Mercer's blade. Now we must return the favor.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你还活着。讽刺的是，要治疗墨瑟那把剑所留下的伤，得用毒药才行。现在我们该以牙还牙双倍奉还啦。

String.Source: I can sympathize with Gallus. Torn between two paths, I chose the most exciting, never realizing the thrills that can come from reading a dusty tome.
String.Dest: 我能同情理解加卢斯。两条分岔路, 我选择了最刺激的那条，却从未想到真正的刺激是来自阅读那本满是灰尘的大书.

String.Source: Nightingales...the Twilight Sepulcher...I admit, at first I didn't care much for your adventures with the Thieves Guild. But this is living history.
String.Dest: 夜莺...黄昏坟墓...我承认，起初我对你与你那盗贼公会的冒险故事没什么兴趣。但，这就是活生生的历史啊。

String.Source: Whatever Mercer stole can be replaced. The important thing is that Karliah's honor is restored.
String.Dest: 墨瑟所偷走的东西并不是无可替代，因而无足挂齿。卡莉亚的名誉得以恢复才是最为重要的。

String.Source: I know you seek vengeance, and you wish to do this for the Guild, but if you agree to this oath, be sure you are fine with the consequences.
String.Dest: 我知道你渴望复仇，而且你希望为公会做这件事，但是如果你恪守这个誓言，那就得确定你不会为结果而后悔。

String.Source: Ah, there you are. I trust none of you are hurt?
String.Dest: 啊，你在这儿啊。你没受伤吧？

String.Source: Those plans must be extremely valuable, given the gauntlet of traps protecting it. I think that axe nicked me, by the way. I may need a moment.
String.Dest: Those plans must be extremely valuable, given the gauntlet of traps protecting it. I think that axe nicked me, by the way. I may need a moment.

String.Source: With Mercer dead, and the key in your hands, this should feel like an end. But this test Karliah speaks of makes me think this isn't over.
String.Dest: 既然墨瑟已经死了，钥匙也已经到了你的手中，一切似乎已经尘埃落定。但卡莱雅所说的那个测试让我觉得这还没有结束。

String.Source: Master of the Thieves Guild. Congratulations. I may not agree with all your decisions, but I respect what you've endured to get here.
String.Dest: 盗贼公会的大师。恭喜。我可能无法完全按同意你的决定，但我尊重你一路走来所经受的考验。

String.Source: I am not your father. I won't lecture you on why thievery is wrong. But you know where I stand.
String.Dest: 我可不是你老爸。我不会对你的偷窃行为说教。但你知道我的立场的。

String.Source: Amazing. The blue flame that cleansed Kodlak's soul burns with the light of Aetherius. As if this tomb were connected to Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 太神奇了。刚才净化克拉科灵魂的蓝色火焰竟然是来自艾瑟瑞斯的。就好像这座古墓可以直接连通松加德似的。

String.Source: Kodlak's journal spoke of a battle with a great wolf. These ghosts will prepare us, and ensure we are worthy of fighting by his side.
String.Dest: 克拉科的日记讲述了一场与巨狼的战斗. 这些鬼会锻炼我们, 确保我们能英勇地为他而战.

String.Source: The fates can be cruel, to take Kodlak now. I only pray that the Shadow shields Hircine's eye, so that the stars can guide his soul to Aetherius.
String.Dest: 命运真是残酷，竟然夺走了克拉科的生命。我唯一的愿望是阴影能遮蔽海尔辛的双眼，星光能指引他的灵魂前往光界。

String.Source: Ulfric's war has done so much harm, but I think the bad blood between Stalleo and Brurid is about something deeper.
String.Dest: 乌佛瑞克发动的战争已经造成那么大的危害，可我觉得斯塔莱奥和布鲁瑞肚子里的坏水还要更阴狠得多呢。

String.Source: So much senseless death for a feud between two men. I commit these souls to Aetherius. Blessings of the Nine upon them.
String.Dest: 两人之间的世仇却导致了这么多无意义的死亡。我保证会让这些灵魂前往艾瑟瑞斯的。愿九圣灵在天上祝福他们。

String.Source: It's no surprise that the wolf's blood corrupts the spirit. But no matter how pernicious the disease, I believe the stars will divine a cure.
String.Dest: 那只狼的血会污染灵魂并不奇怪。但不管这种病有多恶劣，我都相信星辰会赐予救赎。

String.Source: It would be wise to tell Stalleo of the bodies that were found in the tunnels. A false hope will only create more hardship in the end.
String.Dest: 明智的做法是告诉斯塔莱奥我们在隧道找到了一些尸体。不会有结果的希望只会带来更大的伤害。

String.Source: This roof is open for a reason. There are stories of ancient forges that draw strength from the moons, just as we draw magic from the stars.
String.Dest: 把屋顶打开也是因为这个原因。一些古老的故事说，月亮是力量之源，正如我们从星辰中汲取魔力一样。

String.Source: You're now a full fledged member of the Companions, I see. Careful that you do it for honor, and not for coin or blood, as it appears the others do.
String.Dest: 我懂了，你现在是一个成熟的战友团成员了。请为你的荣誉而战吧，别被钱或杀戮的快感左右。就像其他人做的那样。

String.Source: It appears Grosta was mistaken about her husband. She still may think him foolhardy. I say he was brave. I commit his soul to Aetherius.
String.Dest: 看来格罗斯塔误会了她的丈夫，至今以为他只是莽撞而已。而我看他是真的很英勇。愿他的灵魂安息于艾瑟瑞斯。

String.Source: Njada is an impressive brawler. She has the Warrior's spirit and the Atronach's strength. Yet if I were a betting man, I wouldn't dismiss my chances.
String.Dest: Njada is an impressive brawler. She has the Warrior's spirit and the Atronach's strength. Yet if I were a betting man, I wouldn't dismiss my chances.

String.Source: Candles, soul gems, and the Firmament. It seems these conjurers are asking the stars for aid. The presence of the Atronach is strong here.
String.Dest: Candles, soul gems, and the Firmament. It seems these conjurers are asking the stars for aid. The presence of the Atronach is strong here.

String.Source: So that's why Savos was reluctant to discuss Labyrinthian. I won't judge him. We all have our secrets, and our regrets.
String.Dest: 所以这就是萨沃斯不情愿讨论迷之城的原因。我不能指责他。我们都有自己的秘密，和自己的遗憾。

String.Source: The Staff of Magnus! Incredible! What you hold in your hands, my lady, is a piece of the stars themselves.
String.Dest: The Staff of Magnus! Incredible! What you hold in your hands, my lady, is a piece of the stars themselves.

String.Source: The Staff of Magnus! Incredible! What you hold in your hands, my boy, is a piece of the stars themselves.
String.Dest: 玛格努斯之权杖！不可思议！你以为你手中拿的是什么，我的孩子，这可是星辰本身的一部分。

String.Source: Windhelm. I once brawled a Nord woman here with a chin like an anvil. I wonder if she's still at Candlehearth Hall.
String.Dest: 风舵城。我曾经在那把一个诺德女人用铁链绑的像铁毡一样。我想知道她现在是否还在烛炉堂旅店。

String.Source: The stars are with us. The Tower will open the door, the Steed will guide us forward, and the Warrior will show Ancano the depth of his arrogance.
String.Dest: 群星与我们同在，高塔将开启大门，骏马将指引我们前行。武士之星将要让安卡诺体会到他无边傲慢的代价。

String.Source: These are no ordinary draugr wights. Their swords will drain your very life force.
String.Dest: 这些可不是普通的尸鬼。他们的剑会吸你的血。

String.Source: It seems this Elf tried to escape, or managed to kill herself before becoming enthralled. The vampires had no choice but to drain her blood.
String.Dest: 看到这个精灵试图逃跑，还想在堕落前自杀。吸血鬼不得不吸干她的血液。

String.Source: The city is safe, but this is far from over. We should hurry back to Mirabelle, she may be in danger.
String.Dest: 城市很安全，但一切都还没结束。我们要赶紧回到米拉贝勒身边，她可能有危险了。

String.Source: Labyrinthian. They say Shalidor built it as a test to see if one was worthy of ascending to Arch-Mage. What will that mean for you if you pass it?
String.Dest: 谜之城，有人说沙利多建造它只是为了考验一个人是否可以成为首席法师。如果你通过了，这将意味着什么？

String.Source: I am pleased to learn Tolfdir is emphasizing the value of defensive spells. May the Apprentice guide you in your training.
String.Dest: 我很高兴知道托夫迪尔认同防御型法术的价值。愿学徒之石指导你的训练。

String.Source: There must be hundreds of coffins up there. I've never seen anything like it. They almost look like teeth.
String.Dest: 那儿放了有差不多几百口棺材。我从没见过那样的景观。排列得像牙齿一样。

String.Source: That orb is emitting some sort of magical resonance. It's an amazing discovery, my lady. I just wish my father were alive to see it.
String.Dest: 那个球体正在发出某种魔法般的共振。我的女士，这个发现太惊人了。我真希望我的父亲还在世能够亲眼见一见这神奇的东西。

String.Source: That orb is emitting some sort of magical resonance. It's an amazing discovery, my boy. I just wish my father were alive to see it.
String.Dest: 那个球体正在发出某种魔法般的共振。我的孩子，这个发现太惊人了。我真希望我的父亲还在世能够亲眼见一见这神奇的东西。

String.Source: Orthorn reminds me of a young man who was similarly torn between two paths. But in the end, youth will gravitate toward excitement and danger.
String.Dest: 奥松恩让我想起了一个同样在两条道路上徘徊不定的年轻人。但最终，年轻人会被那条充满刺激与危险的道路吸引。

String.Source: Vampires are like the Serpent. Cursed. Unpredictable. While the Mage is its enemy, so are the Warrior and the Thief. We should dispose of them.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼就像蛇。讨厌。诡异。法师与他们为敌，就像战士和盗贼一样。我们要部署好。

String.Source: The Serpent has taken the Caller's life, and now she belongs to the stars. I commit her soul to Aetherius.
String.Dest: 蛇夺走了呼唤者的性命，现在她属于星空。我把她的灵魂囚禁在艾瑟瑞斯。

String.Source: The Augur of Dunlain. I think my father spoke of him as a wizard of some renown. Curious as to why he doesn't have a larger presence here.
String.Dest: 预言师杜兰。我父亲曾说过他是个有些名望的法师。他在这里居然没什么名气，这点挺让我吃惊的。

String.Source: The Eye of Magnus. The Staff of Magnus. Can such artifacts truly exist on this plane? Is Magnus not the sun and stars?
String.Dest: 玛格努斯之眼。玛格努斯之杖。这俩上古神器真正存在于世吗？玛格努斯难道不是太阳和星辰吗？

String.Source: The Synod and the College of Whispers care only for politics and power. We must retrieve the staff before they do.
String.Dest: 希诺和低语学院只关心政治和权力。我们必须在他们之前找到法杖。

String.Source: This seems to be a Dwarven lecture hall of some sort. Fascinating.
String.Dest: 这似乎是某处矮人演讲厅，真令人惊叹。

String.Source: This store should have plenty of magical supplies given its proximity to the college. What she calls "Oddments," others may call resources.
String.Dest: 既然这家店如此靠近学院，那一定有卖一大堆魔法用品。她把那些魔法用品称为"零碎"，而其他人则称之为资源。

String.Source: By Aetherius, a dragon priest! Anska, when you called Vokun "some old priest" I didn't realize the implications.
String.Dest: 艾瑟瑞斯在上，一个龙祭司！安斯卡，你把沃昆叫做“某个老祭司”的时候我还没意识到其中的含义。

String.Source: If and when we visit the College, I would like to visit the Arcanaeum. In the meantime, I might borrow Nelacar's books.
String.Dest: 如果我去拜访这所学院, 我想去参观秘藏馆，也可能会去借阅耐拉卡的书。

String.Source: Iron mines like these are the backbone of a society. Everything from iron shields to cast iron pots can be made cheaply and effectively.
String.Dest: 铁矿就像是这个社会的支柱。上至盾牌，下到罐子，都能用铁制作。既廉价，又实用。

String.Source: My lady Anska, you are quite perceptive. That is no ordinary gem. Or rather that is no ordinary pedestal it sits upon.
String.Dest: 我的安斯卡女士，你眼光敏锐。这可不是普通的宝石。且承载它的祭台也是不同寻常。

String.Source: Anska, we are happy to assist you. Family history is important. May the Tower guide us through this ruin.
String.Dest: 安斯卡，我们很乐意协助你。家族传承是很重要的。愿那座塔引领我们越过那座遗迹。

String.Source: The Serpent is strong in Erandur. This could very well be a trap, but it's worth investigating nonetheless.
String.Dest: 依兰杜尔那家伙没安什么好心。尽管这更像是个陷阱，但还是有一探究竟的价值的。

String.Source: The Temple of the Divines is truly a work of art. And why not. For every archway, every mosaic of stone was inspired by the Gods.
String.Dest: 圣灵的神殿是一个真正的艺术品。为什么不呢。它的每一道拱门，镌刻在石头上的每一个花纹，都是源于众神的启迪。

String.Source: Fort Hraggstad. The view from atop here is spectacular. You can see the Sea of Ghosts stretch on from here to eternity.
String.Dest: 哈格斯塔德堡垒。在这上面的景色真是壮观。你可以看见幽灵之海向四周延展，从这里，到天边。

String.Source: (Laughs) That robe fits you well. It seems you are just as comfortable at court as you are on the battlefield.
String.Dest: (笑声)这法袍很适合你。看样子你在法庭上就像在战场一般，挺悠哉的嘛。

String.Source: Is Madena still the court wizard here? She fought in the Great War. Strange how so many of us share the same experiences, without ever having met.
String.Dest: Is Madena still the court wizard here? She fought in the Great War. Strange how so many of us share the same experiences, without ever having met.

String.Source: When interrogating a suspect, they say the Oculatus can see into a man's soul. Yet few know the "inward sight" can also apply to oneself.
String.Dest: 审问嫌犯的时候，他们宣称锐眼鹰能看穿人的灵魂。但没有几个人会想到，这种“洞察能力”迟早也会被用到自己身上。

String.Source: I worry about this young apprentice. If she can't even pronounce her master's name correctly, she won't do well with customers.
String.Dest: 我有点儿担心这个年轻的学徒。如果她甚至不能正确地念出她家大师的名字，那估计她做的也不能让客人有多满意。

String.Source: That was an intense fight. Jarl Idgrod said Movarth haunted this hold for centuries. But now, he is just another ghost story.
String.Dest: 这是一场激烈的战斗。领主伊格罗德说莫瓦斯在这片土地上为非作歹好几个世纪了。但是现在，它也不过是一个鬼故事而已了。

String.Source: Judging by his notes, it's hard to tell whether this Dunmer was bewitched by the amulet, or his own greed.
String.Dest: 从他的笔记来看，很难判断这个丹莫到底是被那个护身符迷惑了，还是被他自己的贪欲。

String.Source: I've heard apothecaries say that places that are cool and damp are ideal for alchemy ingredients. But this flooding probably forced them to move.
String.Dest: 我听药剂师们说，那些凉爽和潮湿的地方都有着理想的炼金材料。但这洪水可能会迫使它们移去别处。

String.Source: Rest easy, my lady. Your death has been avenged, and your soul can be at peace.
String.Dest: 放心吧，我的女士，你的仇已经报了，你的灵魂可以安息了。

String.Source: Towers like this used to be important defensive outposts. Now it serves as a home to derelicts.
String.Dest: 像这样的塔楼在过去曾经是重要的防御前哨。而现在它却仅仅只是充当那些流浪汉的家。

String.Source: The library they've gathered here is impressive. I'm tempted to stay and lose myself in a book.
String.Dest: 他们这图书馆建得太棒了。我真忍不住要留下来好好读书了。

String.Source: Bereft of his master, this dog carries on. He's a survivor. Loyal, but fearless. I would be honored to have it in our company.
String.Dest: 尽管失去了主人，但这条狗却没有放弃。它是个幸存者。忠诚，而无所畏惧。我很荣幸让它成为我们的伙伴。

String.Source: It seems unnatural for this Hroggar to kill his wife and daughter in the name of lust. But perhaps I am speaking from my own perspective.
String.Dest: 要说赫鲁加为了淫欲把他老婆和女儿杀了有点不合常理啊...不过也可能是我没能站在他的角度看这个问题吧。

String.Source: It's probably a coincidence, but that book by the beds there...is that "The Exodus?" A haunting tale, but I imagine what these men faced was worse.
String.Dest: 也许是个巧合，但那本放在床边的书...是”远行记“吗？那是个令人难忘的故事，但我想这些人面对的是些更糟糕的事儿。

String.Source: With this stone, I could cast more healing spells, but I would take more damage. Thus it is ideal for the apprentice, who supports from the rear.
String.Dest: 通过这个立石，我可以施展更多的治疗法术，但同时我也会承受更多的伤害。因此，对那些从后方支援的学徒来说，这相当完美。

String.Source: Morthal has been home to many skilled apothecaries. The diverse climates provide a wealth of plant life. We should see if Lami has any good recipes.
String.Dest: 墨索尔城对于很多技术精湛的药剂师来说就是家园，多变的气候带来了丰富的物种。我们得看看拉米会不会有什么好配方。

String.Source: Don't be afraid to experiment. The Song of the Alchemist teaches us that in alchemy and in life, many discoveries come by accident.
String.Dest: 不要害怕尝试。炼金术师之歌告诉我们，炼金术与生活一样，有很多的发现来源于偶然。

String.Source: I overheard a boy who lives here had a mother who left to join the Stormcloaks. It's sad. Ulfric's war is now dividing individual families.
String.Dest: I overheard a boy who lives here had a mother who left to join the Stormcloaks. It's sad. Ulfric's war is now dividing individual families.

String.Source: So Laelette...the woman who joined the Stormcloaks...she was actually a vampire. But I still stand by what I said about Ulfric.
String.Dest: 所以拉莱特...那个加入风暴斗篷的女人...她其实是个吸血鬼。但我仍然坚持我对于乌佛瑞克的看法。

String.Source: Movarth...Where have I heard that name before? No, it couldn't be. Do you by chance have a copy of "Immortal Blood?"
String.Dest: 莫瓦斯...我好像以前在哪听过这个名字？不，不可能啊。你有没有偶然获得过一份“不朽之血”的副本？

String.Source: These Legionnaires should have known better than to position themselves here. They could get flanked. Shot at from above. These men were green.
String.Dest: 这些军团士兵站位应该更精确一些才对的。他们可能遭到了侧翼攻击或者遭到了上方的射击。这些人还只是菜鸟。

String.Source: A tree. Now this isn't something I expected to see here. For all their machines and monuments, perhaps even the Dwemer value the Gods' craftsmanship.
String.Dest: 一棵树。这不是我现在所希望看到的。对于他们所有的机器和古迹，可能甚至连锻莫都将其视为神的工艺。

String.Source: Interesting. I have wandered with many a marksman, but you handle that bow with an aplomb that I have yet to see in another.
String.Dest: 有点意思。我认识几个所谓的神射手，可我从未见过有一个人操弓时如你一般泰然自若.

String.Source: Watching you use stealth reminds me of the story of Sheogorath and Hircine, and how the nimble bird felled a Daedroth.
String.Dest: 看着你使用潜行让我想起了谢尔格拉斯和海尔辛的故事，还有敏捷的飞鸟是如何掉入鳄鱼嘴里的。

String.Source: Even as a Legionnaire, I was never comfortable using two-handed weapons like yours. They require too much aggression.
String.Dest: 就算是当兵的时候，我也从没有像你那样自如地使用双手武器。那玩意太需要蛮劲了。

String.Source: Our reward? I shudder to think what kind of reward a Daedric Lord has to offer us, but I fear it will only get worse if we defy him.
String.Dest: 我们的奖励？我一想到魔族领主能给我们提供什么样的奖励就不寒而栗。但我担心无视他的话会变得更糟。

String.Source: The blood of a Daedra is believed to sharpen a blade when cooled. But retrieving it is often not worth the cost. The Jarl's request is short-sighted.
String.Dest: 据说用魔族的血来做冷却可以让兵器锋利无比。可要弄到那玩意的本钱往往是得不偿失。那领主想得太简单了。

String.Source: Nimhe the Spider. I almost feel sorry for it. Funny how a name changes the way you look at something, even a foul beast like this.
String.Dest: 蜘蛛尼姆赫。我几乎会为它感到遗憾。即使是这样一个怪物，它的名字也能改变你看待事物的方式，多么有趣。

String.Source: While I despise the Thalmor, we must abide by the treaty we signed. If our words lack conviction, than we are no better than thieves.
String.Dest: 虽然我瞧不起梭默，但是我们必须遵守我们签下的协定。如果我们说话不算话，那么我们自己也不比那些小偷好多少。

String.Source: In Cidhna Mine, a life sentence is a death sentence. For everyone, it seems, but you. Good to see you made it out.
String.Dest: 在希讷矿坑，无期徒刑与死刑无异。对每个人来说都是这样，除了你。很高兴看到你活着出来。

String.Source: Another dead researcher. This should have been a sign to turn back, but it seems his friends pressed on.
String.Dest: 另一个死去的研究员。他们看来本该是要折返，但看上去他的朋友们要继续前行。

String.Source: The Orc bard here. His poetry is...well...it's offensive. It makes me want to cast a healing spell on my ears.
String.Dest: 这儿的兽人吟游诗人。他的诗很...额...不和谐。我都想对自己耳朵丢一个治愈魔法了。

String.Source: To think, an idle Dwarf once sat on this bench, and drank from this very cup. It's like watching someone's long forgotten memory.
String.Dest: 想想看，一个百无聊赖的矮人曾坐在这把长凳上，用这个杯子喝酒。就像是在看着某人已被遗忘的久远记忆。

String.Source: Madanach must be a charismatic leader to inspire such fierce loyalty. Nepos and his servants died valiantly.
String.Dest: 迈德纳奇一定得是个非常有魅力的领导者，才能激发这种狂热的忠诚。内普斯和他的仆人死得英勇。

String.Source: Miners, farmers, children. It matters not your age, your job, your gender or your creed. Too many people are being forced to become soldiers.
String.Dest: 矿工，农民，孩子。这与你的年龄，职业，性别或是信念无关。被迫成为士兵的人太多了。

String.Source: Amanda Alleia was right. Markarth is a vertical city. There's a reason the drunks stick to the ground floor.
String.Dest: 阿曼达·艾丽雅说得真对。马卡斯是座垂直的城市。难怪那些醉鬼只敢逗留在一层。

String.Source: We've cleared Kolskeggr Mine, but I fear Pavo and Gat won't be able to hold it on their own. At some point, the Jarl must listen to their pleas.
String.Dest: 我们已经清理了科斯凯格矿场，但我担心仅靠帕沃和噶特两个人是守不住的。领主最好还是在适当的时候去听听他们的请求。

String.Source: This was not a random attack. While I doubt this Margret is Princess Talara reborn, she is certainly more than a commoner.
String.Dest: 这不是一次偶然的袭击 。而我怀疑玛格丽特是塔拉让公主复生，她显然不只是个平民。

String.Source: It comes as little surprise that the trail leads here, to The Treasury House. Yet we should not levy any accusations until we know the whole truth.
String.Dest: 线索指向了珍宝屋 ，这一点儿不让人惊讶。但在知道全部真相前，我们不能提出任何指控。

String.Source: Mulush is a hard foreman, but it's a thin line between building character and crushing one's spirit. Even I know naught the difference.
String.Dest: 暮鲁什是个努力的领班，不过塑造个性和打压一个人的精神之间只有一线之隔。即使是我也对两者之间的区别一窍不通。

String.Source: Bothela claims she can craft a love potion. (Laughs) A "young love" potion perhaps, with the effects just as fleeting.
String.Dest: 波塞拉说她能够做出爱情药剂来呢。（笑声）说不定就是那种"年轻"的爱情药剂，那效果连三秒都维持不了。

String.Source: Legends speak of Bannermist Tower, whose flag never fell, but stood high above the mist, welcoming the weary traveler home to Falkreath Hold.
String.Dest: 军团如是说：在迷雾中屹立不倒旌旗不落的旗霭塔欢迎疲惫的旅者来到佛克瑞斯。

String.Source: Alchemists and hunters often die like this, without a burial. I commit this soul to Aetherius, Blessings of the Nine upon him.
String.Dest: 炼金术师和猎人经常就这样死了，曝尸荒野或街头。愿这灵魂长眠于艾瑟瑞斯，九圣灵保佑他。

String.Source: Alchemists and hunters often die like this, without a burial. I commit this soul to Aetherius.
String.Dest: 炼金术师和猎人经常就这样死了，曝尸荒野或街头。愿这灵魂长眠于艾瑟瑞斯，九圣灵保佑他。

String.Source: I know I seem like the unadventurous type, but I love a good brawl. Although I'll think twice before challenging Uthgerd again.
String.Dest: 我知道我看上去不是那么能打，但我很喜欢打架。尽管挑战阿斯盖德之前我总得做上很久的心理斗争。

String.Source: The Last Scabbard of Akrash is a tale of love, intrigue, and mystery. Let's hope for Ghorza's sake the boy bothers to read the parts about smithing.
String.Dest: 阿卡托什的最后诗歌是一个爱情的传说，阴谋，和秘密。但愿裹扎让那对男孩兄弟去读的是有关锻冶的那一节。

String.Source: Fort shrines like these are common. Whether the occupants be Imperial, Stormcloak, or Forsworn, on the eve of war, all men become priests.
String.Dest: 这样的堡垒圣祠很常见的。不管占领者是帝国军队，风暴斗篷，还是弃誓者，在战争前夕全员都会变成教士。

String.Source: There are two places where soldiers bond. On the field of battle, and here in the dining hall.
String.Dest: 士兵们在两个地方特别团结。一是战场，另一个，就是这家餐厅。

String.Source: Mogen, son of Molag told a story of sobbing woman who haunted a similar cabin. We can only hope that Anise does not turn into a wight.
String.Dest: Mogen, son of Molag told a story of sobbing woman who haunted a similar cabin. We can only hope that Anise does not turn into a wight.

String.Source: This cemetery...I apologize, but if you'll allow me a moment, I wish to speak with you.
String.Dest: 这座坟墓...我很抱歉，但可以耽搁你一会儿吗，我想跟你说点儿话。

String.Source: When I look at the wounded I...I apologize, but if you'll allow me a moment, I wish to speak with you.
String.Dest: 当我去看那个伤者时...我...很抱歉，请给我点时间，我想跟你谈谈。

String.Source: This library is so grand. Never in all my years...If you'll allow me a moment, I wish to speak with you.
String.Dest: 这图书馆实在是高端大气。我这辈子还没...如果你方便的话，我有些话想和你说。

String.Source: I am sorry about Kodlak. The worst tragedies comes without warning, when our emotions are unguarded. Then, not even time can cure the pain.
String.Dest: 克拉科的事情我表示遗憾。最令人悲伤的噩耗总来得那么猝不及防，连一点心理准备的时间都不给我们。现在，只有时间才能治愈伤痛了。

String.Source: Such senseless violence. These are not warriors. These are farmers, shopkeepers, and priests. What do the Thalmor have to gain with their deaths?
String.Dest: 如此愚蠢的暴力行为。在这的都不是战士，而是农民，店主和牧师。梭默能从他们的死亡中获得什么？

String.Source: War can help the local towns by bringing work to the villages. The inn is full, the mill is prospering, and even a bard has seen fit to roost here.
String.Dest: 战争确实能帮助各大城镇向周遭村落提供工作机会。看看那人满为患的旅舍，人欢马叫的磨坊，就连平时根本不会过来的吟游诗人们也有不少。

String.Source: This Elf died of avarice. Greed is a pernicious disease, more deadly than vampirism, with symptoms that are far more difficult to detect.
String.Dest: 这个精灵因贪婪而死。贪婪是种非常致命的疾病，而且难以根除。

String.Source: It's no surprise we got the jump on them. Bandits make for poor sentries. Their eyes are trained to look toward treasure, not danger.
String.Dest: 我们抢在他们之前行动并不奇怪。强盗是可怜的哨兵的天敌。他们的眼睛受过辨别宝藏的训练，而不是危险。

String.Source: During the war, we used to dress up dummies. Although instead of a bucket helm and a wooden sword, we'd have straw shooting out of his hands.
String.Dest: During the war, we used to dress up dummies. Although instead of a bucket helm and a wooden sword, we'd have straw shooting out of his hands.

String.Source: The Ritual Stone. It will grant you the power to raise the dead to fight for your cause.
String.Dest: 仪式之石。它会赐予你让死者复生并为你而战的力量。

String.Source: The Ritual Stone is near Graywinter Watch. If this conjuration mage Olivia speaks of uses corpses, we can use that to our advantage.
String.Dest: 仪式之石就在灰冬望台附近，要是这位召唤师奥利维亚提起使用尸体的事，就正中咱们下怀了。

String.Source: By the Lord Stone...You're Dragonborn. It's said the blood of the kings flows through you.
String.Dest: 君主守护石...你是龙裔。这么说来，你体内流淌着历代君主的血液。

String.Source: Congratulations are in order. Balgruuf has made you a Thane. Which means you'll be rubbing elbows with those in the Cloud District from now on.
String.Dest: 就等着给你道贺呢。巴尔古夫封你做了男爵。这意味着你现在能跟那些在云霄区的上流阶层交往了。

String.Source: Tamriel has a very rich tradition of mingling war and song. The Skalds of Skyrim, the Sword-Singing Ansei of Hammerfell...this bard is no exception.
String.Dest: Tamriel has a very rich tradition of mingling war and song. The Skalds of Skyrim, the Sword-Singing Ansei of Hammerfell...this bard is no exception.

String.Source: This poor soul was trapped in this bird cage to sharpen the wolves' scent. Even if I could repair his wounds, I could not repair his mind.
String.Dest: 这个可怜的灵魂被囚禁在这个鸟笼里来使得狼群的嗅觉保持敏锐。即使我可以修复他的伤口，也无法修复他心灵上的创伤。

String.Source: This man works Chillfurrow farm by his lonesome. At times I wonder if we healers should be here, to mend those whose labor is essential.
String.Dest: 这个人独自在寒畦农场干活。有时候我在想，我们这些医者是不是也该驻扎在那儿，让那些劳动力保持健康是至关重要的。

String.Source: These dense forests can be quite harrowing. It is good to find a warm fire, and warm company.
String.Dest: These dense forests can be quite harrowing. It is good to find a warm fire, and warm company.

String.Source: What ancient darkness lurks in this cave? This column of light brims with magic, but the bodies are evidence of its misuse.
String.Dest: 这个洞里潜藏着什么样的远古黑暗？这个光柱充满着魔法，但从这些尸体来看它明显不应该被用在这里。

String.Source: This is no ordinary fire. Mages did this.
String.Dest: 这不是普通的火。这是法师放的火。

String.Source: With these forts, there is always an entrance for archers to gain access to the roof. It is possible these Orc hunters are unaware of it.
String.Dest: 这些要塞里总会给弓箭手们留出一条通到屋顶的入口。也有可能这些兽人猎人们并没有注意到这一点。

String.Source: It seems our friend Ghunzul was a conspiracy theorist, based on his reading habits. And judging by his station, a strong leader as well.
String.Dest: 从他的阅读习惯看来，貌似我们这位甘泽尔朋友是个阴谋论家。当然从他的地位来看，也是个强势的领导者。

String.Source: Careful. Halldir is no ordinary mage. It seems he channels a trine of power from the three corpses who lay below.
String.Dest: 小心点，霍迪尔可不是那种普通法师。看起来他似乎将躺在下面的那三具尸体的力量给聚在了一起。

String.Source: The Keepers of the Razor were a militia group, working to banish the world of Mythic Dawn artifacts. I wonder if this one's motives are as pure.
String.Dest: 剃刀的守护者是一个志愿组织，致力于消灭神话黎明教团的遗物。我怀疑这家伙的目的并不是那么单纯。

String.Source: The Jarl must have abandoned this mine after the cave-in. A pity, as the camp is well preserved.
String.Dest: 领主肯定在塌方之后就把这个矿井废弃了。真遗憾，作为一个营地来说，这里的隐蔽性很不错。

String.Source: Bandits. Let us send these souls to the Dreamsleeve.
String.Dest: 强盗。让我们把这几个灵魂送进梦袖吧。

String.Source: Bandits find honor to be a hindrance. Let us show them how they have erred.
String.Dest: 强盗土匪们总碍手碍脚，还以此为荣，让我们告诉他们这是个多么离谱的错误。

String.Source: The locals often talk of Camilla the maiden fair. A beautiful woman can start wars great and small, but only because her fickle heart wages the same.
String.Dest: 这里的人们经常谈论凯米拉这个小美人。一个漂亮的女人总能引发一场或大或小的战争，这是因为她那善变的心中也在经历着战争。

String.Source: The glow from the Sleeping Tree is the color of magelight, and it is little wonder they say it fell from the stars.
String.Dest: 沉睡之树发出的光芒像极了魔光术的颜色，也难怪他们说它是从星辰中坠落的。

String.Source: People depend on the iron from this mine. These bandits must suffer for crimes beyond the murder of the miners.
String.Dest: 人们都以矿场中的铁矿为生，这些强盗们对此必须承担比杀死矿工的凶手还要沉重的罪行。

String.Source: Watch your step. The passage is narrow, the road slippery, and the bones a terrible portent indeed.
String.Dest: 留神脚下，通道很窄，路又很滑，而这些骨头着实是个可怕的预兆。

String.Source: The charm of a small town never ages. The poet Cassius once wrote that "Small towns are the heart, where modesty and nostalgia are defined."
String.Dest: 那座小镇的魅力永不老化。诗人卡修斯曾经写道：“小镇是间心房，里面充满了实实在在的质朴和怀旧 。”

String.Source: Hjaalmarch. Here is where the ashen warband, the Askelde Men, made their stand. Such history.
String.Dest: 希雅陲领。这就是苍灰战团——那些阿斯克德人，所屹立的地方。历史就是那样。

String.Source: Is that Adonato Leotelli? I'm a great admirer of his work. Many know of "Olaf and the Dragon," but "Ghosts in the Storm" is a step above.
String.Dest: 阿多纳托·莱奥特利？我特别喜欢他的作品。许多人都知道“奥拉夫与龙，”但是“风暴中的幽灵”比它更胜一筹。

String.Source: Not to be rude, but this restoration master does protest too much. When I prattled on, my father warned me that "close wounds" works on the mouth.
String.Dest: 无意冒犯，但这复归的主人要求的实在是太多。当我说闲话的时候，我父亲总会警告我说“闭合伤口”法术也能合上嘴巴。

String.Source: Adonato Leotelli describes the Falmer as "snow-devils with pallid skin and lifeless black eyes, like something out of a nightmare." He is right.
String.Dest: 阿多纳托·莱奥特利对雪精灵的描述是"一身苍白色的皮肤，带着一双死鱼眼的雪白色恶魔，就如梦魇一般。"他说得真形象生动呐。

String.Source: You remind me of Topal the pilot, drifting to new worlds while in search of an old one.
String.Dest: 你让我想起了领航员托帕尔，一个为了寻找一个旧世界而在各个新的世界里四处漂泊的家伙。

String.Source: Thieves insist they are honorable, because they avoid violence. Violence can take many forms. One can starve to death when they are stripped of coin.
String.Dest: 小偷们坚称自己是高尚的，因为他们不使用暴力。但暴力有着各种不同的表现形式。一个遭了偷窃而身无分文的人很有可能被活活饿死。

String.Source: The Annotated Anuad. I have a copy I could lend Esbern, if he really can't do without it.
String.Dest: 《阿努注解》。如果没有它，伊斯本就做不来的话，那我这儿还有本副本可以借给他。

String.Source: I have seen men break under the pressure of confinement. Hopefully, Esbern read enough books to keep his mind lucid.
String.Dest: 我见过很多人在被幽闭的压力下坏掉了。希望伊斯本读的书够多，可以让自己的神智依然清醒。

String.Source: You made it. When I was a soldier, I despised subterfuge. Now, I value its ability to end wars without bloodshed.
String.Dest: 你做到了。当我还是个士兵时，我鄙视那些花招。而现在，我敬佩这种兵不血刃的能力。

String.Source: Valenwood aligned with the Thalmor during the Great War. But as Malborn shows, you can't judge a person by the actions of his leaders.
String.Dest: 威木省在世界大战期间和梭默结为盟友。就如同马博尔所展示那样，你不能通过司其领导之职而做出的行为来评判一个人。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Come on, is that all you've got?
String.Dest: 来呀来呀，就这点本事吗？

String.Source: Ugh!
String.Dest: 呃！

String.Source: Ugh...ugh.
Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Do your worst!
String.Dest: 你这样还不够看！

String.Source: Your efforts are in vain!
String.Dest: 你所有的努力都将白费！

String.Source: Do not think you've bested me!
String.Dest: 别以为你能赢我！

String.Source: Agh! Bastard!
String.Dest: 啊！混蛋！

String.Source: Agh! Enough! This ends now!
String.Dest: 噢！够了！一切都完了

String.Source: Ugh, you fiend!
String.Dest: 呃啊，你这恶魔！

String.Source: Is that the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了？

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 嘿呀！

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 嘿呀！

String.Source: You picked the wrong dinner, animal!
String.Dest: 你选错了晚餐，畜生！

String.Source: Go back to where you came from, dragon!
String.Dest: 巨龙，滚回你来的地方。

String.Source: Some legend you are!
String.Dest: 你只不过会夸夸其谈而已！

String.Source: That won't heal easy!
String.Dest: 这可不怎么好治！

String.Source: Do not worry, your pain will soon end!
String.Dest: 别担心，痛苦很快结束！

String.Source: Ugh...
This isn't the end...
String.Dest: 还没结束...

String.Source: We're routed! Flee if you can!
String.Dest: 我们被击溃了！各自想办法逃走！

String.Source: You need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 你需要做得更好！

String.Source: That all you've got?
String.Dest: 你就这么点能耐？

String.Source: I can take you!
String.Dest: 你完了！
