String.Source: Think you can take me, Orc?
String.Dest: 你觉得你能搞定我么，兽人？

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: I'll cut right through your scales, monster!
String.Dest: 我能连你的鳞片都一刀切了，怪物！

String.Source: Say hello to Ysmir for me, Nord!
String.Dest: 帮我向伊斯米尔问个好，诺德佬！

String.Source: Hircine will not claim this soul!
String.Dest: 赫希恩将不会想要这个灵魂的！

String.Source: For the Companions!
String.Dest: 为了同伴！

String.Source: For Kodlak!
String.Dest: 为了克拉科！

String.Source: You're outmatched!
String.Dest: 你输了！

String.Source: You won't get away!
String.Dest: 你跑不了！

String.Source: You don't stand a chance!
String.Dest: 你一点机会也没！

String.Source: You will not touch her!
String.Dest: 不会让你伤到她的！

String.Source: I commit you to Aetherius!
String.Dest: 你还是滚去艾瑟瑞斯吧！

String.Source: Now you know I'm not some lowly priest!
String.Dest: Now you know I'm not some lowly priest!

String.Source: Your wounds are fatal, dragon!
String.Dest: 你的伤口好恐怖啊，死龙！

String.Source: You do not belong on this plane, ghost!
String.Dest: 你不属于这个地方，幽灵！

String.Source: You will not win this!
String.Dest: 你赢不了！

String.Source: The Orcs are known for their smiths and their hunters, but their chiefs are some of the best brawlers in Tamriel.
String.Dest: 兽人都是因出色的铁匠和猎人而闻名，但兽人酋长们却是泰姆瑞尔大陆上最好的战士。

String.Source: Ainethach may have no choice but to sell. This town needs guards, but the ones who hired the sellswords will likely make sure they never come.
String.Dest: 艾尼塔克恐怕除了卖掉之外没别的选择了，这城镇需要守卫，但是那个出钱雇佣兵的家伙们很快就会希望佣兵再也不要来这个地方。

String.Source: Someone told me the stablemaster here has fists like boulders. But it turns out the name Hofgrir Horse-Crusher has more to do with his backside.
String.Dest: Someone told me the stablemaster here has fists like boulders. But it turns out the name Hofgrir Horse-Crusher has more to do with his backside.

String.Source: People say Benor has a brawler's face. Sometimes I'm not sure if that's a compliment or an insult.
String.Dest: 人们说本诺长了一张嘲讽脸。有时我都搞不清这究竟算是恭维呢还是一种侮辱。

String.Source: Orphan's Tear. I don't know if the name is for the coast or the shipwreck, but I know it's far too poetic for a bandit camp.
String.Dest: 孤儿之泪。我不知道这是否是那个海岸或是沉船的名字，但我觉得这作为一个强盗营地的名字，有些过于诗意了。

String.Source: Potema, the Wolf Queen. Not even the dragons would be as devastating for this land as her return. We should return to Falk with the news.
String.Dest: 波特玛，狼心女王。就连龙族带给这个大陆的灾难也比不上她的回归。我们应该把这个消息告诉佛可。

String.Source: These glowing mushrooms are like underground stars. Yet we are a long way from Aetherius.
String.Dest: 这些荧光的蘑菇很像地底下的星辰。不过我们离到光界还很远呐。

String.Source: Geirmund's Hall. The former Arch-Mage is buried here, a wizard who lived in the days of the High King Harald.
String.Dest: 格尔蒙德大厅。前任首席法师就被埋葬在这儿，那是名生活在至高王哈拉德统治时期的巫师。

String.Source: Bears often use these animal dens to hibernate through the long winters. In Skyrim, where winter is ever present, that doesn't seem to be the case.
String.Dest: 熊类通常会在这些兽穴里冬眠。但在全年如冬的天际省，情况好像就并非如此了。

String.Source: This looks to be study hall. If the puzzle proves difficult, we should scour the desks for clues.
String.Dest: 这看起来是个自修室。如果谜题很困难，那我们就应该在书桌上找找线索。

String.Source: Just as their masters are blind, so too are the Falmer servants living in this dark, shadowy abyss. They look to the sky, and see only a ceiling.
String.Dest: 正如他们的主人是个瞎子一样，生活在幽暗深渊的黑暗之处的雪精灵也是如此。他们仰望天空，能看到的却只有天花板。

String.Source: This laboratory is well organized. The owner was not the type to go out unprepared, yet even then, it was not enough. I commit his soul to Aetherius.
String.Dest: This laboratory is well organized. The owner was not the type to go out unprepared, yet even then, it was not enough. I commit his soul to Aetherius.

String.Source: Cabins sliding off the mountain, rubble and debris everywhere...this excavation doesn't appear to be very professional.
String.Dest: 从山上滑下来的木屋，到处都是的瓦砾和废墟...这次发掘看起来不怎么专业啊。

String.Source: True or not, these rumors surrounding Wolfskull Cave are just another consequence of Ulfric's rebellion. There aren't enough men to spare.
String.Dest: True or not, these rumors surrounding Wolfskull Cave are just another consequence of Ulfric's rebellion. There aren't enough men to spare.

String.Source: Beware the Daedric Princes, even ones like Meridia who champion justice. Her light mimics the stars, but it shines darkly.
String.Dest: 尽管有像梅芮狄娅那样自称拥护正义的魔神存在，但还是提防着点那些魔神。她的光芒看似与星辰一样，但实际上却照耀着黑暗。

String.Source: King, warrior, and the Dragonborn. In the days of Tiber Septim, these symbols spoke of the same person.
String.Dest: King, warrior, and the Dragonborn. In the days of Tiber Septim, these symbols spoke of the same person.

String.Source: The structural integrity of the temple is seems to be intact. Although those holes in the roof probably won't help with the cold.
String.Dest: 神殿的结构依旧十分完整。尽管那满是窟窿的屋顶似乎抵御不了寒风。

String.Source: The Greybeards are a secretive group. It is a wise course, when knowledge in the wrong hands can prove catastrophic.
String.Dest: The Greybeards are a secretive group. It is a wise course, when knowledge in the wrong hands can prove catastrophic.

String.Source: Just as these great ruins stand in the shadow of Winterhold, so does the past get obstructed by our view of the present.
String.Dest: Just as these great ruins stand in the shadow of Winterhold, so does the past get obstructed by our view of the present.

String.Source: A book on the Dragonguard...written by hand. A priceless artifact, and Esbern, well...Maybe it's better you hold on to it.
String.Dest: 关于神龙卫的一本书...手写稿。无价的艺术品，以及伊斯本，好吧...说不定还是你拿着它比较好一点。

String.Source: Delphine, you would not have brought us here alone if this were a trap. I do not speak for the Dragonborn, but I trust you. For now.
String.Dest: 戴尔菲娜，如果这是个陷阱的话，你就不会独自带着我们到这儿来了吧。虽说不能代表龙裔，但我相信你了。暂时的。

String.Source: That's not true. You read beautifully during our last lesson.
String.Dest: That's not true. You read beautifully during our last lesson.

String.Source: You just need to slow down, child. With these books, there are often words beneath the words. But if you read too quickly you'll miss them.
String.Dest: 你需要的只是慢下来，孩子。在这些书里面，含义经常藏在字里行间。而你若读得太快就会错过它们。

String.Source: As you wish, my love.
String.Dest: 如你所愿，亲爱的。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: As you wish.
String.Dest: 遵命。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: My love, let us walk the path of the stars, and walk it together.
String.Dest: 吾爱，让我们沿着星辰的轨迹，继续并肩而行。

String.Source: Lover grant us passion.
String.Dest: 爱人给予我们的激情！

String.Source: Carry on then.
String.Dest: 那就继续吧。

String.Source: May the serpent bless our deeds, and curse the wicked.
String.Dest: May the serpent bless our deeds, and curse the wicked.

String.Source: Ritual show us penitence.
String.Dest: 仪式向我们表明了忏悔。

String.Source: Apprentice gift us with knowledge.
String.Dest: 学徒之石能让我们获得知识。

String.Source: May the Lord help us endure.
String.Dest: 也许领主能助我们渡过难关。

String.Source: Lady, teach us tolerance.
String.Dest: 夫人教会了我们宽容。

String.Source: Atronach shield us from pain.
String.Dest: 侍灵保护我们免受痛苦。

String.Source: May the Shadow hide our movements.
String.Dest: 愿阴影掩盖我们的行迹。

String.Source: Tower bless our adventure.
String.Dest: 塔保佑我们的探险。

String.Source: I am at your assistance.
String.Dest: I am at your assistance.

String.Source: The Jarl has a difficult decision. A dragon can fly over the city walls. He can't send all his troops to the tower, and yet he can't afford not to.
String.Dest: 领主手头的选项很少。龙能飞过城墙。他不能派遣他所有部队到塔楼去，但同时他也无法承受不这样做的后果。

String.Source: For Kodlak!
String.Dest: 为了克拉科！

String.Source: The fates can be cruel, to take Kodlak now. I only pray that the Shadow shields Hircine's eye, so that the stars can guide his soul to Aetherius.
String.Dest: 命运是如此地残酷，才会在此时带走克拉科的生命。我只能祈祷阴影会遮蔽海尔辛的双眼，愿星辰指引他魂归艾瑟瑞斯。

String.Source: Ah, it is good to see you traveler. Yet it would be wise to remove yourself from this camp. The Imperials do not take kindly to Stormcloaks.
String.Dest: 啊，很高兴见到你，旅行者...不过你最好离开这个营地。帝国人可不欢迎风暴斗篷。

String.Source: Ah, it is good to see you traveler. Perhaps you can help us with the wounded. There are many who need tending.
String.Dest: 啊，很高兴见到你旅行者。或许你会帮我们照料这些伤残者，这里有许多人需要照顾。

String.Source: Greetings, my lady.
String.Dest: 你好，我的女士。

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Happiness is not a daily goal. Remember that when the night is long.
String.Dest: 幸福不是短期目标。当长夜漫漫之时记住这个。

String.Source: Ready to move?
String.Dest: 准备行动？

String.Source: We've stopped. Good. A patient mind sees with clear eyes.
String.Dest: 我们停下了。很好。一个病人的心思能从他清澈的双眼里看出来。

String.Source: I will close your wounds, great and small.
String.Dest: 我会帮你愈合所有的伤口的。

String.Source: My lady, I am pleased to have you with me, and honored to be your husband.
String.Dest: 我的女士，我很高兴能有您陪伴左右，能够成为您的丈夫我真是万分荣幸。

String.Source: I am at your assistance.
String.Dest: I am at your assistance.

String.Source: Stars guide us.
String.Dest: 愿星辰指引我们前行的方向。

String.Source: Steed make us swift.
String.Dest: 骏马之石会让我们更快。

String.Source: Warrior give us strength.
String.Dest: 战士之石给予我们力量。

String.Source: Mage grant us wisdom.
String.Dest: 法师赐予我们智慧。

String.Source: Thief give us fortune.
String.Dest: 盗贼给我们带来财富。

String.Source: Be careful!
String.Dest: 小心！

String.Source: I'm on your side!
String.Dest: 我就在你身旁！

String.Source: You're testing my patience!
String.Dest: 你是在考验我的耐性！
